1a1('bum): @#/ /'bum na pa bzhugs so//
1b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya don
1b2('bum): dgu pa/ /rab 'byor/ ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par
1b3('bum): gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang
1b4('bum): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi
2a1('bum): d wags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil
2a2('bum): zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dwags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems
2a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dwags kyi skye gnas de dag nas
2a4('bum): rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dwags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis
2a5('bum): lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs
2b1('bum): su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor
2b2('bum): ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
2b3('bum): s nyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug
2b4('bum): bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags
2b5('bum): kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de
2b6('bum): dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dag pa'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig
3a1('bum): rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
3a2('bum): 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ngas 'di nas
3a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang
3a4('bum): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul ba rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed
3a5('bum): cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de
3a6('bum): dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par
3b1('bum): ldang ba dang / /de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan
3b2('bum): las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/
3b3('bum): ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa'
3b4('bum): s ems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna
3b5('bum): spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /
3b6('bum): yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i
3b7('bum): 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral
4a1('bum): bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs
4a2('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul
4a3('bum): de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag
4a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye
4a5('bum): gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
4a6('bum): su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ngas 'di nas sangs
4a7('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems
4b1('bum): d pa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i
4b2('bum): phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags
4b3('bum): kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig
4b4('bum): rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar
4b5('bum): mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
4b6('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod
4b7('bum): pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
5a1('bum): chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag
5a2('bum): nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su
5a3('bum): mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
5a4('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
5a5('bum): s ems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston
5a6('bum): pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas
5a7('bum): de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du
5b1('bum): skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
5b2('bum): ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
5b3('bum): n a byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab
5b4('bum): tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems
5b5('bum): bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten
5b6('bum): dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam
5b7('bum): yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
6a1('bum): g ang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal
6a2('bum): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems
6a3('bum): dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs
6a4('bum): nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi
6a5('bum): bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
6a6('bum): la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
6a7('bum): rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /
6b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs
6b2('bum): su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal
6b3('bum): med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur bar shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/
6b4('bum): sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/
6b5('bum): rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
6b6('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
6b7('bum): kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang
7a1('bum): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur
7a2('bum): pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos
7a3('bum): pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa/ 'du
7a4('bum): byed thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du
7a5('bum): byed thams cad ni/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas
7a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
7a7('bum): po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
7b1('bum): la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
7b2('bum): gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shes cher myos
7b3('bum): pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa/ 'du byed
7b4('bum): thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed
7b5('bum): thams cad ni/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi
7b6('bum): spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i
7b7('bum): ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa
8a1('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las
8a2('bum): 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas
8a3('bum): shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag
8a4('bum): pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ yid brtan du mi
8a5('bum): rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di
8a6('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'
8a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul
8b1('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su
8b2('bum): mya ngan las 'das par gyur ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan
8b3('bum): lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi
8b4('bum): rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du
8b5('bum): byed thams cad ni/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi
8b6('bum): spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
8b7('bum): po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
9a1('bum): la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su
9a2('bum): mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan
9a3('bum): lngas shes cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi
9a4('bum): rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/
9a5('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas
9a6('bum): kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
9a7('bum): po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la
9b1('bum): chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa
9b2('bum): dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag
9b3('bum): la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur bar shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad
9b4('bum): ni/ sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ rnam
9b5('bum): par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
9b6('bum): la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i
9b7('bum): ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang
10a1('bum): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su
10a2('bum): mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de la lha'i bu gang 'dod
10a3('bum): pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur bar shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag /'du
10a4('bum): byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/
10a5('bum): yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to/ /rab
10a6('bum): 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems
10a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
10b1('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs
10b2('bum): su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon
10b3('bum): tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag /'du byed thams cad
10b4('bum): ni/ mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ yid brtan du
10b5('bum): mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas
10b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
10b7('bum): po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la
11a1('bum): chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs
11a2('bum): su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de la lha'i bu gang 'dod
11a3('bum): pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag /'du
11a4('bum): byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams
11a5('bum): cad ni/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to/ /
11a6('bum): rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub
11a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lha ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag / chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba
11b1('bum): bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ da ltar byang chub sems
11b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ni/ ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
11b3('bum): po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
11b4('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag / chos thams cad
11b5('bum): stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de
11b6('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ni/ ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems
11b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi
12a1('bum): ' jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon
12a2('bum): par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag/ chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta
12a3('bum): ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnams la
12a4('bum): chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ni/ ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs
12a5('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
12a6('bum): rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag/ chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog
12a7('bum): dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
12b1('bum): rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ni/ ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung
12b2('bum): ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
12b3('bum): bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag / chos thams cad stong pa la ci
12b4('bum): zhig lta ba bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems
12b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ni/ ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
12b6('bum): kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
12b7('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag /chos thams cad
13a1('bum): stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed
13a2('bum): pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ni/
13a3('bum): ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la
13a4('bum): rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can
13a5('bum): gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag/ chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag
13a6('bum): la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la
13a7('bum): gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ni/ ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab

13b6('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag/ chos
13b7('bum): thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/
14a1('bum): rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/
14a2('bum): de ni/ ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la

14a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
14b1('bum): chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di
14b2('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

14b6('bum): gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i
14b7('bum): dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis

15b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun
15b2('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub
15b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o/ /rab
15b4('bum): 'byor/ ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems
