15b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya brgyad cu pa/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams
15b7('bum): sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams sdud de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing gi
16a1('bum): sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud
16a2('bum): pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gser ram/ dngul lam/ nor bu'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUr+ya'am/
16a3('bum): dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byu ru 'am/ sa le sbram mam/ zas sam/ skom mam/ gdugs sam/ gos sam/ sbos sam/ 'phreng ba'am/ byug pa'am/ mal cha'am/ stan nam/ 'tsho
16a4('bum): pa'am| bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ rta'am/ glang po'am/ bdag po yongs su gtong na/ 'di skad du kye sems can dag tshur shog /bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar bslang mi
16a5('bum): dgos par khyer cig / long la dengs shig ces brjod de/ sbyin pa des sbyin pa byin nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong ngo / /chos la skyabs su gtong ngo / /dge 'dun la
16a6('bum): skyabs su gtong ngo / /la la ni/ bslab pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin du 'dzud do/ /la la ni/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas pa la nye bar gnas par byed do/ /la la ni/ dge
16a7('bum): ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do/ /la la ni/ bsam gtan dang po la 'god do/ /la la ni/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'god do/ /la la ni/ bsam gtan gsum
16b1('bum): pa la 'god do/ /la la ni/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do/ /la la ni/ byams pa la 'god do/ /la la ni/ snying rje la 'god do/ /la la ni/ dga' ba la 'god do/ /la la ni/
16b2('bum): btang snyoms la 'god do/ /la la ni/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do/ /la la ni/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do/ /la la ni/ cung zad med pa'i skye
16b3('bum): mched la 'god do/ /la la ni/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la 'god do/ /la la ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ chos rjes su
16b4('bum): dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ gtong
16b5('bum): ba rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ lus la mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i 'du shes su so sor brtag pa la
16b6('bum): yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ rnam par dag pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ yang dag par spong ba
16b7('bum): bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ dbang po lnga la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ stobs lnga la yang dag par
17a1('bum): skul lo/ /la la ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ stong
17a2('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ mthar gyis gnas
17a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag
17a4('bum): par skul lo/ /la la ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ snying rje chen po la yang
17a5('bum): dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su grub par bya ba la
17a6('bum): yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ lan gcig
17a7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la
17b1('bum): ni| rang byang chub la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/ /
17b2('bum): rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing thabs mkhas
17b3('bum): pas bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god de/ rab 'byor/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/
17b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gnyis po 'di dag ni/ chos
17b5('bum): kyi sbyin pa ste/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang /
17b6('bum): ma nor bar bstan pa ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
17b7('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang thun mong du gyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor/ de ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o/ /rab
18a1('bum): ' byor| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de
18a2('bum): las bskyod de/ de las bskyod nas thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do/ /de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni/ gang /
18a3('bum): 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni/ gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
18a4('bum): dang | dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
18a5('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams so/ 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
18a6('bum): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/ /lan gcig
18a7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
18b1('bum): phyin pa shes pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
18b2('bum): tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /
18b3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med
18b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes
18b5('bum): pa'o| |mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /dran
18b6('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /dbang po lnga shes pa'o/ /stobs lnga shes pa'o/ /byang chub kyi
18b7('bum): yan lag bdun shes pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi
19a1('bum): shes pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad shes pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
19a2('bum): shes pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams shes
19a3('bum): pa'o| |gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /
19a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes pa'o/ /byams pa chen po shes pa'o/ /snying rje chen po shes pa'o/ /dga' ba chen po shes pa'o/ /btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o/ /gzhan
19a5('bum): yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams
19a6('bum): shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so/ /byang chub sems dpa'
19a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba ste/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
19b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/
19b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin
19b3('bum): te| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
19b4('bum): dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan
19b5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod do/ /gsol pa/ bye brag ji lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
19b6('bum): ni| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing chos thams cad mun pa
19b7('bum): med pa thob pa la byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med
20a1('bum): do| |rab 'byor/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo / /
20a2('bum): rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las
20a3('bum): 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
20a4('bum): chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
20a5('bum): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / tshad med bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
20a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon gnas mkhyen pa dang / mngon par
20a7('bum): shes pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag pa bzhi dang / dbang bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / bsrung du
20b1('bum): med pa gsum dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
20b2('bum): pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/ 'di ni/ 'jig
20b3('bum): rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/
20b4('bum): shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la zad pa'i rjes
20b5('bum): su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ /nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor
20b6('bum): ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /tshor ba la kun
20b7('bum): 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /tshor ba la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /tshor ba la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du
21a1('bum): gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ /nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan
21a2('bum): pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /sems la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /sems la zad
21a3('bum): pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /sems la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /sems la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang
21a4('bum): yang nye bar len pa med do/ /nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas
21a5('bum): 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la zad pa'i rjes su
21a6('bum): lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar
21a7('bum): len pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to ma dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spang
21b1('bum): ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / bsgom pa yongs
21b2('bum): su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems
21b3('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin
21b4('bum): spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang
21b5('bum): po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de dag ni/ dbang po lnga zhes bya'o/ /stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge
21b6('bum): 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ de dag ni/ stobs lnga zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
21b7('bum): dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs
22a1('bum): pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag ni/
22a2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang
22a3('bum): dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag
22a4('bum): ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o/ /de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa
22a5('bum): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /
22a6('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /smon
22a7('bum): pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /rnam par
22b1('bum): thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams
22b2('bum): mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzang bar mos pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di
22b3('bum): ni/ rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
22b4('bum): te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /'du shes dang
22b5('bum): tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
22b6('bum): pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang
22b7('bum): bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas
23a1('bum): rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de
23a2('bum): dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa
23a3('bum): dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o/ /zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang
23a4('bum): spangs| sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su
23a5('bum): dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub
23a6('bum): par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so/ /zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de
23a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so/ /zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
23b1('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad ma yod do/ /zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
23b2('bum): te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shas med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam
23b3('bum): pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni/ mthar gyis
23b4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/ /de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ mtha' dag sa dang / mtha' dag chu dang / mtha' dag me dang / mtha' dag rlung dang /
23b5('bum): mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha' dag ser po dang / mtha' dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang / mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni/
23b6('bum): mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o/ /de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug pa
23b7('bum): dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang
24a1('bum): po'o| |nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag
24a2('bum): zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing
24a3('bum): phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du
24a4('bum): shes pa/ de ni/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug
24a5('bum): pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/ /nang gzugs
24a6('bum): med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon por snang ba/ mdog sngon po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me tog o ma ka lta bu'am/ yul wA ra NA sir
24a7('bum): byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba/ kha dog sngo ba/ sngo bar snang ba/ mdog sngo bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du
24b1('bum): shes pa 'di ni/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser por snang ba/ mdog ser po
24b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing ka shi ka ri'i me tog lta bu'am/ yul wA ra NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba/ kha dog ser ba/ ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser bar mthong yang gzugs
24b3('bum): de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing
24b4('bum): phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar por snang ba/ mdog dmar po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ man+du dzi ba ka'i me tog lta bu'am/ yul wA ra NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar
24b5('bum): dmar ba/ kha dog dmar ba dmar bar snang ba/ mdog dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa
24b6('bum): 'di ni/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar por snang ba/ mdog dkar
24b7('bum): po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skar ma pa ba sangs kyi 'od lta bu'am/ yul wA ra NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba/ kha dog dkar ba/ dkar bar snang ba/ mdog dkar bar mthong yang
25a1('bum): gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o/ /
25a2('bum): de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol
25a3('bum): gyi nyon mongs pa me skye ba'i mthu yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis 'grub pa de ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /smon lam gyi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te
25a4('bum): 'di shes par bya'o/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes pa'am/ shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par gyur pa de la yid kyis smon pa byed de/ de
25a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur cing / shes bya de'ang shes pa de ni/ smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mngon par shes pa drug
25a6('bum): gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes
25a7('bum): pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/ drug po de dag go /de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/
25b1('bum): lus yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang
25b2('bum): ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba
25b3('bum): dang | ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag go /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas
25b4('bum): la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da
25b5('bum): ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams sna tshogs can
25b6('bum): dang / khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyis mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang
25b7('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /
26a1('bum): kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang /
26a2('bum): rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
26a3('bum): mkhyen to/ /rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang /
26a4('bum): tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar du'ang rjes su dgongs so/ /bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas bskal pa brgya'i bar dang / bskal pa brgya phrag
26a5('bum): du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni/
26a6('bum): 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go /ming ni/ 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs ni/ 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rus ni/ 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /zas ni/ 'di za za'o/ /yun
26a7('bum): ni/ 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so/ /tshe'i mtha' ni/ 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/ /zhes bya ba nas de nas shi 'phos nas kyang
26b1('bum): 'dir skyes so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so/ /lha'i mig rnam par dag
26b2('bum): pa mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dag kyang gzigs so/ /kha dog sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan
26b3('bum): song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dong ba'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni/ lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis ngan du
26b4('bum): spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung
26b5('bum): ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang
26b6('bum): ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o/ /zhes bya bar rab tu
26b7('bum): mkhyen to/ /zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba dang / zag pa med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ bcu po de
27a1('bum): dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par
27a2('bum): sangs rgyas so/ /zhes dam bcas na/ de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so/ /zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs
27a3('bum): pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes
27a4('bum): su ma mthong bas/ bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor
27a5('bum): gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go / tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang
27a6('bum): ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do/ /zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to/ /zhes
27a7('bum): bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye rgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur
27b1('bum): ro| |zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob
27b2('bum): pa rnams par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/
27b3('bum): bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan
27b4('bum): pa de dag la bsten na/ bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na
27b5('bum): chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba
27b6('bum): med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten
27b7('bum): na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang
28a1('bum): y ang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan
28a2('bum): byas na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par mi 'byung ngo / /zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skyed gu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/
28a3('bum): 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba
28a4('bum): thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /tshangs
28a5('bum): pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su'ang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis
28a6('bum): rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ni/ mi 'jigs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so
28a7('bum): yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang
28b1('bum): gang zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmigs pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa
28b2('bum): gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su
28b3('bum): 'ong / zhes gang yang bcabs par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni/ bsrung ba med pa dang po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gsung gi spyod pa yongs su
28b4('bum): dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa me mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcabs par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs
28b5('bum): pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni/ bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod
28b6('bum): pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcabs par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni/ bsrung ba med pa gsum pa'o/ /
28b7('bum): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i
29a1('bum): sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na'ang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar
29a2('bum): mi 'gyur/ thugs yeng yeng bor mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o/ /la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog
29a3('bum): pa med pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed na'ang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi 'gyur/ thugs mi ches par
29a4('bum): mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o/ /la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nya bar gzhog la/ chos dang gnyer ba'i
29a5('bum): chos la nan tan du byed/ la la rna ba btud de rim gror mi nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed kyang
29a6('bum): des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa'am/ thugs khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/
29a7('bum): dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod
29b1('bum): pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'da' ba ste/ de ni/ nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi
29b2('bum): sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ nyon mongs pa spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni/ de lta bu'ang
29b3('bum): mi mnga' ste/ de ni/ bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan
29b4('bum): pas 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad ces bya ste/ dngos
29b5('bum): su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/ de ni/ thugs rje chen po zhes
29b6('bum): bya'o| |rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/ /ca co mi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa
29b7('bum): nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o/ /thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'o/ /ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o/ /mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /
30a1('bum): brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /shes rab yongs su
30a2('bum): nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye
30a3('bum): shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /thugs kyi phrin las thams
30a4('bum): cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma
30a5('bum): thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
30a6('bum): rnams so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmigs pa med pa dran pas dbang sgyur ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang
30a7('bum): ldan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/
30b1('bum): phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin
30b2('bum): tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing dra rab dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi sdu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dwags e na ya'i
30b3('bum): byin pa lta bu dang / phyag bral drang por slebs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su
30b4('bum): 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng+ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar
30b5('bum): chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems mnyam
30b6('bum): pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi
30b7('bum): mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ mu khyud can/ lte ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa'am/ ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra
31a1('bum): ba mnga' bas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o/ /zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas/ zhabs
31a2('bum): shin tu gnas pa'o/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel bas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o/ /shing bal gyi be'u ltar shin tu 'jam zhing
31a3('bum): gzhon pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o/ /phyag dang zhabs dang ma gur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas/ bdun shin tu mtho ba'o/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas/
31a4('bum): sor mo ring ba'o/ /rting pa ring bas/ rting pa yangs pa'o/ /sku lag pa mdun du 'phags la drang bas/ sku che zhing drang ba'o/ /pus mo'i lha nga dang / long bu mdzes par nub pas/ zhabs
31a5('bum): legs par mtho ba'o/ /sbu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas/ yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o/ /ri dwags e ne ya'i byin pa dang / smyig ma dang / ldum bu dar ba ltar
31a6('bum): drang zhing ma nyams la rim gyis gzhal bar grub cing / byin pa zlum pas ri dwags e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu'o/ /brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis
31a7('bum): pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas/ phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o/ /glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs
31b1('bum): su nub pa'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas/ gser gyi kha dog go /gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug la/
31b2('bum): sku la rdul mi 'go bas/ mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o/ /shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing gnyis su med pas/ spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'o/ /me tog kund
31b3('bum): dang / zla ba dang / 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/ nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas/ zhal
31b4('bum): mdzod spus brgyan pa'o/ /ro stod che bas/ seng ge'i ro stod do/ /mgur dang rgyud legs par 'brel cing lhun zlum pas/ phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o/ /gser gyi gtan pa
31b5('bum): shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas/ phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o/ /rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis ma nyams shing rnam par shes pa 'ang ba med pas/ ro bro
31b6('bum): ba'i mchog go / sku chu zheng 'dom gang du mnyam pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zhing gab pa'o/ /spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing
31b7('bum): legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas/ dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o/ /me tog ut+pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas/ ljags shin tu yangs
32a1('bum): shing srab pa'o/ /tshangs pa dang bya ka la ping+ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs so/ /'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par
32a2('bum): grub cing mdzes par skyes te yid du 'ong bas/ seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o/ /me tog kund dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas/ tshems shin tu dkar ba'o/ /
32a3('bum): tshems la mtho dman med pas/ tshems mnyam pa'o/ /tshems la mtshams ma dod pas/ tshems thags bzang ba'o/ /bla 'og dgye dgu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang
32a4('bum): ba'o/ /dkar nag gi cha ma 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma yog pas/ spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o/ /rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma
32a5('bum): 'dzings pas/ pa'i rdzi ma lta bu'o/ /de la bla ma'i bsu bskyal dang / chos mnyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten rjes su bsgrub pa la sogs pa la phu dud du byas pas/
32a6('bum): phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so/ /yi dam la brtan pas/ zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni mi g.yo zhing shin tu
32a7('bum): brtan pa'i snga ltas so/ /sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba ste/
32b1('bum): de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas so/ /bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba phyin pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba
32b2('bum): ste| de gnyis ni bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so/ /bcings pa bkrol ba dang / srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs
32b3('bum): pas sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so/ /dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang / bzung ba mngon par spel zhing 'grib par
32b4('bum): ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste/ de ni mi nyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so/ /rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing gzhan byin pa
32b5('bum): dang | bdag gis blangs pas ri dwags e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so/ /bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na mi 'gong bar gtong zhing / med ces ma
32b6('bum): byas pas/ phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so/ /grogs po dang / mdza' bshes dang / gnyen ma skye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can
32b7('bum): rnams bsdums pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i
33a1('bum): snga ltas so/ /stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po byin pas/ gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/
33a2('bum): de gnyis ni/ gdan dang / na bza' dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so/ /'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang /
33a3('bum): pha ma dang / phu nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gror byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / bcol ba rna la ma gzang pas/ spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su
33a4('bum): 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni/ mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so/ /mi snyan par mi zer zhing mi smod la/ snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun
33a5('bum): par 'dzin pas seng+ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni/ thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so/ /na ba rnams la rtsi dang / rim gro dang / sman dang / nyams
33a6('bum): su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni/ nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so/ /skyed mos tshal dang / 'khor dang / btung
33a7('bum): ba dang / rdzing bu dang / rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / 'phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang / gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong
33b1('bum): zhing / bdag gis gzhan byin pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni/ mnga' ba chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ /yun ring por tshig snyan cing
33b2('bum): 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smras pas/ ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni/ yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ /
33b3('bum): gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba
33b4('bum): dang / btang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o/ /yun ring po nas chig bkyal ba spangs shing dus su smra smra bas/ seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni/ tshig kun
33b5('bum): gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so/ /rim gror bya ba dang brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas/ tshems shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni/ 'khor snga nas bsags
33b6('bum): pa'i snga ltas so/ /yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshems smra smra bas/ tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/ de ni/ 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga
33b7('bum): ltas so/ /pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la/ ma chags mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas/ spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma
34a1('bum): lta bu ste/ de ni/ kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so/ /rab 'byor/ de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /de la
34a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs
34a3('bum): kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i
34a4('bum): mdog snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ tshul la kha
34a5('bum): na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
34a6('bum): 'das rnams ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis gzhal ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thugs dang / gsung dang / sku'i 'phrin las dang /
34a7('bum): 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/ rtsa mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grel pa ste/ rtsa la mdud pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
34b1('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni/ shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mi mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam
34b2('bum): pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mi'i seng ge ste/ seng+ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mi'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud
34b3('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ ma'i khyu
34b4('bum): mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
34b5('bum): 'das rnams ni/ blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas
34b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ sku shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs
34b7('bum): pa ste/ sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sku
35a1('bum): dang / gsung dang / thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan
35a2('bum): pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas
35a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston
35a4('bum): pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas
35a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga'
35a6('bum): ba ste/ sku zhum pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byad ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
35a7('bum): ni| yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / nyid
35b1('bum): lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang nyid lags pa bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med
35b2('bum): cing rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'khor ba'i nyes
35b3('bum): pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas
35b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos zad pa rnam par bzlog pa ste/ phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba
35b5('bum): zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
35b6('bum): ni| slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/ kun spyod
35b7('bum): pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mngal ba ste/ sku la sme ba dang gnag bag med pa yin/
36a1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ shing bal ltar yang ba rab tu thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas
36a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rang gi skye bo dang / skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyor chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
36a3('bum): shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba
36a4('bum): yin| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha cang mi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
36a5('bum): gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du bkye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul
36a6('bum): ba ste/ ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
36a7('bum): 'das rnams ni/ byis ba so so'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyi chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
36b1('bum): rnams ni/ glang po'i sgra dang / 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ snyan
36b2('bum): cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
36b3('bum): srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang
36b4('bum): ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sa'i
36b5('bum): phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ tshems mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems
36b6('bum): mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas
36b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs
37a1('bum): pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa
37a2('bum): yin| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang /
37a3('bum): skyes bu dang / na chung mchog mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba ste/ spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar
37a4('bum): 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jam par
37a5('bum): 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/
37a6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
37a7('bum): 'das rnams ni/ chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ nyon mongs pa'i
37b1('bum): rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa
37b2('bum): yin| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
37b3('bum): rnams ni/ phas kyi rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin
37b4('bum): tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ yul gyi bud pa rnam par bzlog pa ste/ dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
37b5('bum): mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud
37b6('bum): pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu mi 'dzing ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
37b7('bum): brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu mi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa
38a1('bum): ste/ dbu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang / dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa
38a2('bum): yin te/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar de lta bu'i
38a3('bum): chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang
38a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
38a5('bum): chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya gya gcig pa/ /rab 'byor/ ji
38a6('bum): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol
38a7('bum): tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
38b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
38b2('bum): chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab
38b3('bum): 'byor| de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
38b4('bum): po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can
38b5('bum): rnams sdud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
38b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin
38b7('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
39a1('bum): ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
39a2('bum): chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/
39a3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad du
39a4('bum): 'doms shing 'di skad ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyed tshur sheg /yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig /yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig /yi ge
39a5('bum): gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig / yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig /yi ge gnyis kyis byang
39a6('bum): ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig / yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig /yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi
39a7('bum): bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig / yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces ston to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
39b1('bum): chen po de'ang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgom pa la
39b2('bum): mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na/ la la goms shing
39b3('bum): yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ chos la
39b4('bum): mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ de la chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang rab 'byor/ chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang 'bral
39b5('bum): ba'ang ma yin te/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos te/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang
39b6('bum): thun mong ma yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma
39b7('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin tu mi dmigs/ chos kyang mi dmigs/ chos kyi dngos po'ang mi dmigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das
40a1('bum): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang | brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
40a2('bum): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
40a3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid
40a4('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
40a5('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
40a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes
40a7('bum): pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/ de la ni/ sems can mi dmigs te/ sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /sems can mi dmigs
40b1('bum): pas gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can mi dmigs pas tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can mi dmigs pas 'du shes dmigs su ma mchis so/ /sems

46a4('bum): can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /srog stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /'gro ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /gso ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /skyes bu stong pa nyid du rig par
46a5('bum): bya'o| |gang zag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /shed can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /shed bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /byed du
46a6('bum): 'jug pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /kun nas slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /tshor ba bo stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /tshor
46a7('bum): bar byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /shes pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par
46b1('bum): bya'o| |yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /dbang po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /stobs stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /
46b2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /bsam
46b3('bum): gtan stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /tshad med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad stong pa
46b4('bum): nyid du rig par bya'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
46b5('bum): stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin
46b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /byams pa
46b7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
47a1('bum): bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /
47a2('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad
47a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig
47a4('bum): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas phyin ci log tu gyur
47a5('bum): pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la'ang mi 'jug pa de ltar ston to/ /des de ltar mthong nas chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te/ chos gang
47a6('bum): yang 'khrug par mi byed/ gnyis su mi byed do/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du'ang ston pa byed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni/ sprul
47a7('bum): pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la
47b1('bum): la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan bzhi la sbyor/
47b2('bum): la la tshad med pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyor/

47b5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyor/ la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/ la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sbyor/ la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la
47b6('bum): sbyor| la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyor/ la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byams pa chen po la sbyor/ la la
47b7('bum): snying rje chen po la sbyor/ la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor/ la la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la
48a1('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor/ la la rang byang chub la sbyor/ la la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la sbyor/ la la rnam pa thams
48a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la sbyor na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom
48a3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos
48a4('bum): ston te/ de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni/

50a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de

51a1('bum): te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de
