100a1('bum): ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/
100a2('bum): ji ltar tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi
100a3('bum): ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung snang gi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar kun snang dang ba'i
100a4('bum): lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab bar bgyi/ ji ltar chung dge'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
100a5('bum): dge rgyas kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung che'i lhar skye bar bgyi pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par
100a6('bum): bgyi| ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas
100a7('bum): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar
100b1('bum): bgyi| ji ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing
100b2('bum): der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab
100b3('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gsum pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bzhi pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
100b4('bum): sems bskyed pa lnga pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa drug pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bdun pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa brgyad
100b5('bum): pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa dgu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nyan thos kyis la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
100b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji
100b7('bum): ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la bslabs shing chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi
101a1('bum): lam la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la bslab
101a2('bum): par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ mig la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba la
101a3('bum): bslab par bgyi/ sna la bslab par bgyi/ lce la bslab par bgyi/ lus la bslab par bgyi/ yid la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ sgra la bslab par bgyi/ dri
101a4('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ ro la bslab par bgyi/ reg la bslab par bgyi/ chos la bslab par bgyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par
101a5('bum): bgyi| sna'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/
101a6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus
101a7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
101b1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
101b2('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ chu'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ me'i
101b3('bum): khams la bslab par bgyi/ rlung gi khams la bslab par bgyi/ nam mkha'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi/
101b4('bum): 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ming dang gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi/ reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la
101b5('bum): bslab par bgyi/ sred pa la bslab par bgyi/ len pa la bslab par bgyi/ srid pa la bslab par bgyi/ skye ba la bslab par bgyi/ rga shi la bslab par bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
101b6('bum): pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/
101b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
102a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab
102a2('bum): par bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ thog ma dang tha ma med
102a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang
102a4('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
102a5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
102a6('bum): pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ dbang po rnams la bslab par bgyi/ stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
102a7('bum): lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/ tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs med
102b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par
102b2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzungs
102b3('bum): kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab
102b4('bum): par bgyi/ byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab
102b5('bum): par bgyi/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang byang chub la bslab par
102b6('bum): bgyi/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
102b7('bum): chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa'am/ mi spro ba spros par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags grang // //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya gya
103a1('bum): bzhi pa/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings la ni/ rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
103a2('bum): gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor
103a3('bum): ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du shes
103a4('bum): las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so/ /'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed
103a5('bum): las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam
103a6('bum): par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig kyang chos kyi dbyings
103a7('bum): ma lags/ mig las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go /rna ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna
103b1('bum): ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
103b2('bum): ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang chos kyi
103b3('bum): dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o/ /lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
103b4('bum): nyid kyang lus so/ /yid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs
103b5('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra'ang chos kyi
103b6('bum): dbyings ma lags/ sgra las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri la chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dri las gud
103b7('bum): na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o/ /ro'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ro las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
104a1('bum): te| ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg nyid
104a2('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go /chos kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
104a3('bum): so| |chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi rnam
104a4('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
104a5('bum): las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes
104a6('bum): pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
104a7('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa
104b1('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang
104b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi
104b3('bum): dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi
104b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang
104b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
104b6('bum): ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus
104b7('bum): te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang
105a1('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
105a2('bum): nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
105a3('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud
105a4('bum): na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
105a5('bum): tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid
105a6('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i
105a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna
105b1('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
105b2('bum): ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
105b3('bum): gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid
105b4('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus
105b5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
105b6('bum): kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las
105b7('bum): gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
106a1('bum): ba'o| |sa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sa'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
106a2('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chu'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi
106a3('bum): dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /me'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ me'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ me'i khams nyid
106a4('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rlung gi khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
106a5('bum): rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams las skyed na'ang
106a6('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
106a7('bum): lags| rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par
106b1('bum): shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
106b2('bum): nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
106b3('bum): kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos
106b4('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ming dang gzugs nyid
106b5('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so/ /skye mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye mched drug las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye
106b6('bum): mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go /reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg
106b7('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang
107a1('bum): chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /sred pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sred pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sred
107a2('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ len pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ len pa nyid
107a3('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ srid pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang chos
107a4('bum): kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
107a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rga shi las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
107a6('bum): kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
107a7('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
107b1('bum): las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i
107b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos
107b3('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
107b4('bum): mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos
107b5('bum): kyi dbyings ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
107b6('bum): nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
107b7('bum): te| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nang stong pa
108a1('bum): nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /phyi stong pa nyid
108a2('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /
108a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
108a4('bum): nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
108a5('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi
108a6('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/ chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ don
108a7('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas
108b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
108b2('bum): nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
108b3('bum): nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
108b4('bum): las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang
108b5('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos
108b6('bum): kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang
108b7('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
109a1('bum): ma lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang
109a2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos thams cad
109a3('bum): stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang gi mtshan
109a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /
109a5('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
109a6('bum): so| |chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
109a7('bum): ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
109b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo
109b2('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang
109b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
109b4('bum): las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba
109b5('bum): rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
109b6('bum): kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrul
109b7('bum): gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dbang po rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
110a1('bum): ma mchis te/ dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stobs rnams
110a2('bum): las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
110a3('bum): lags| byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan
110a4('bum): lag rnams so/ /lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo/ /
110a5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos
110a6('bum): kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang chos
110a7('bum): kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad med pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshad
110b1('bum): med pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
110b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
110b3('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam
110b4('bum): par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar
110b5('bum): pa rnams so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
110b6('bum): mchis te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar
110b7('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang
111a1('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
111a2('bum): nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams
111a3('bum): las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang
111a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge
111a5('bum): 'dzin rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi
111a6('bum): dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
111a7('bum): rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
111b1('bum): rnams so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos
111b2('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
111b3('bum): mchis te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /byams pa chen po'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
111b4('bum): byams pa chen po las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po'ang chos kyi
111b5('bum): dbyings ma lags/ snying rje chen po las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /sangs
111b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
111b7('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rgyun du zhugs
112a1('bum): pa'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun du
112a2('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
112a3('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'ang chos kyi dbyings
112a4('bum): ma lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi
112a5('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
112a6('bum): so| |chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang byang chub las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang byang chub
112a7('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang
112b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos
112b2('bum): kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
112b3('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/ /gzugs nyid kyang
112b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
112b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so/ /'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
112b6('bum): dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go /rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /
112b7('bum): sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o/ /lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
113a1('bum): dbyings nyid kyang lus so/ /yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
113a2('bum): nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o/ /ro nyid kyang chos kyi
113a3('bum): dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go /chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
113a4('bum): chos so| |mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
113a5('bum): so| |chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam
113a6('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
113a7('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang
113b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /
113b2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i
113b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
113b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
113b5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus
113b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi
113b7('bum): dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
114a1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi
114a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
114a3('bum): dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
114a4('bum): dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos
114a5('bum): kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed nyid kyang chos
114a6('bum): kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs nyid
114a7('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so/ /skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go /reg pa nyid
114b1('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
114b2('bum): dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba
114b3('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi
114b4('bum): dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
114b5('bum): phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi
114b6('bum): dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan
114b7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi
115a1('bum): dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /phyi
115a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa
115a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
115a4('bum): dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
115a5('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha'
115a6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba med pa stong
115a7('bum): pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang
115b1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos
115b2('bum): kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /
115b3('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
115b4('bum): kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag
115b5('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par
115b6('bum): spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
115b7('bum): nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
116a1('bum): nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam
116a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags ba'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
116a3('bum): so| |chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
116a4('bum): 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
116a5('bum): nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
116a6('bum): pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
116a7('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang
116b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs
116b2('bum): pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
116b3('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi
116b4('bum): dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
116b5('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
116b6('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
116b7('bum): bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /rang
117a1('bum): byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
117a2('bum): kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/
117a3('bum): gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/ bla na
117a4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par yang mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
117a5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas chos thams cad ming med pa la ming gi brdas chos ston te/ 'di ni/ gzugs
117a6('bum): zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ 'du shes zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ 'du byed ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ mig ces bya'o/ /'di ni/
117a7('bum): rna ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ sna zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lce zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lus zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ yid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ gzugs zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ sgra zhes bya'o/ /
117b1('bum): 'di ni/ dri zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ ro zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ reg ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ chos zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes
117b2('bum): bya'o| |'di ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes
117b3('bum): bya'o| |'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ /
117b4('bum): 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
117b5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te
117b6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ sa'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ chu'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ me'i
117b7('bum): khams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rlung gi khams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ ma rig pa zhes bya'o/ /'di
118a1('bum): ni| 'du byed ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ skye mched drug ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ reg pa zhes
118a2('bum): bya'o/ /'di ni/ tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ sred pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ len pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ srid pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ skye ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rga shi zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/
118a3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
118a4('bum): zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid
118a5('bum): ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di
118a6('bum): ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
118a7('bum): ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid
118b1('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ dngos po med
118b2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
118b3('bum): zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ dbang po rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ stobs rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ 'phags pa'i lam
118b4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ bsam gtan rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ tshad med pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di
118b5('bum): dag ni| gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
118b6('bum): dgu zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag
118b7('bum): ni| ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams
119a1('bum): zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ byams pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /'di dag
119a2('bum): ni| sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ phyir mi
119a3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ rang byang chub ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o/ /'di ni/ bla na med pa yang
119a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o/ /zhes ston to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma byed pa'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis rdzas kyi rnam pa
119a5('bum): gyin zhig la brten te gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ ba lang gi gzugs sam/ rnga mo dang / lug gi gzugs sam/ skyes
119a6('bum): pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs sam/ skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba mdangs dga' ba'am/
119a7('bum): rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba'am/ nags tshal mdangs dga' ba dag sprul cing / de dag tu stan dang / 'khor gyi stan dang / gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/ me tog dang / phreng ba
119b1('bum): dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs zhim po dag bstan tam/ glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byas sam/ sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'am/ tshul khrims
119b2('bum): bsrung ba'am/ bzod pa bsgrubs pa'am/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtse ba'am/ shes rab bsgoms pa'am/ rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo
119b3('bum): dga' bar byas te/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ ri rab bstan
119b4('bum): tam| rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ 'phrul
119b5('bum): dga'i lha rnams bstan tam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs pa kun
119b6('bum): 'khor gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung snang gi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/
119b7('bum): kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung dge'i lha rnams bstan tam/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstan
120a1('bum): tam/ che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung che'i lha rnams bstan tam/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ mi che ba'i
120a2('bum): lha rnams bstan tam/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ 'og min gyi lha rnams bstan tam/
120a3('bum): nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ 'du
120a4('bum): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
120a5('bum): mang pa bstan tam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
120a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab
120a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
120b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
120b2('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod
120b3('bum): pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos
120b4('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
120b5('bum): dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
120b6('bum): pa rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis pa yongs su
120b7('bum): rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa drug pa yongs su
121a1('bum): rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
121a2('bum): sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' skyon med par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis
121a3('bum): rnam par brtse zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag
121a4('bum): dang nying lags yongs su gtong ba dang / spyad par dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su bsgrub
121a5('bum): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / snying rje
121a6('bum): chen po mngon par bsgrub pa de dgra bstan tam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bstan na/ de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag 'di
121a7('bum): snyam du sems te/ kye ma mi 'dis legs par bslabs pa ngo mtshar che'i/ re mdzes dag byed/ de ltar skye ba dga' bar byed cing / gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i
121b1('bum): gzugs dang / rta'i gzugs dang / bal lang gi gzugs dang / rnga mo dang / lug gi gzugs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs ston pa dang / skyed mos tshal
121b2('bum): dang / gzhal med khang dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / kun dga'i re ba mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / nags tshal mdangs dga' ba ston pa
121b3('bum): dang / de dag tu stan dang / 'khor gyi stan dang / gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs mang po de lta bu ston pa
121b4('bum): dang / glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byed cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam
121b5('bum): par brtse ba dang / shes rab bsgom pa dang / rnam pa 'di dag gis skye bo dga' bar byed cing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang /
121b6('bum): khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / ri rab ston pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams
121b7('bum): ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams ston pa dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /
122a1('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /
122a2('bum): chung snang gi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung dge'i lha rnams ston
122a3('bum): pa dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung che'i lha rnams ston pa dang / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams ston
122a4('bum): pa dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / gya nom
122a5('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
122a6('bum): ston pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'du shas med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha gzugs med pa rnams ston pa dang / rgyun du zhugs
122a7('bum): pa rnams ston pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams ston pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po rnams ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
122b1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
122b2('bum): pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la
122b3('bum): spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod
122b4('bum): pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod
122b5('bum): pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi
122b6('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye
122b7('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa
123a1('bum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam
123a2('bum): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
123a3('bum): pa dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
123a4('bum): pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
123a5('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
123a6('bum): khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nyid lag yongs su gtong
123a7('bum): ba dang / dka' pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
123b1('bum): rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa de dag kyang ston cing /
123b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sku'i yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ston pa ni/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzin do/ /de la skyes bu mkhas shing gsal la yid rno ba
123b3('bum): dang ldan pa/ dpyod pa dang dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni/ 'di snyam ste/ 'di la chos gang yang dmigs su med na/ mi 'di de ltar med pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' bar byed pa
123b4('bum): ni| ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /snyam ste/ sems can 'di dag ni/ dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa'o/ /zhes bya bar de dag gi shes pa 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de
123b5('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong ste/ thabs mkhas
123b6('bum): pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can du mi dmigs/ sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs te/ bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la
123b7('bum): yang dag par skul ba yin/ sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa gtong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag
124a1('bum): kyang tshul khrims srung ba yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi legs par brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang tshul
124a2('bum): khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bzod pa bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bzod pa'i
124a3('bum): legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bzod pa bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin/ gzhan
124a4('bum): yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun
124a5('bum): pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyi legs pa brjod pa
124a6('bum): yin/ sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang shes rab bsgom pa yin/ gzhan
124a7('bum): yang shes rab la yang dag par skul ba yin/ shes rab kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang shes rab sgom pa de dag gis legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga'
124b1('bum): bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi
124b2('bum): legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang yan
124b3('bum): lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par skul ba yin/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso
124b4('bum): sbyin gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/
124b5('bum): bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bslab pa'i gnas lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems
124b6('bum): can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa
124b7('bum): yin| gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan dang po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par
125a1('bum): 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang
125a2('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan gnyis pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug
125a3('bum): pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la
125a4('bum): yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan gsum pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa
125a5('bum): brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/
125a6('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar
125a7('bum): spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byams pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can
125b1('bum): gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje la
125b2('bum): yang dag par skul ba yin/ snying rje'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/

125b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang
125b5('bum): dag par skul ba yin/ btang snyoms kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar
125b6('bum): spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ nam
125b7('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun
126a1('bum): pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang
126a2('bum): dag par skul ba yin/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs
126a3('bum): pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang dag
126a4('bum): par skul ba yin/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod
126a5('bum): cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min
126a6('bum): skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang 'du shes med 'du shes med min
126a7('bum): skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang
126b1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom
126b2('bum): pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par
126b3('bum): skul ba yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar
126b4('bum): spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod

126b6('bum): yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dbang po rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dbang po rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun

127a1('bum): can gzhan gang stobs rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa

127a3('bum): yan lag rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang

127a5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam
127a6('bum): par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag
127a7('bum): gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/
127b1('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang
127b2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
127b3('bum): par 'jug pa dgu'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/
127b4('bum): bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan
127b5('bum): gang mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang
127b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang ting nge
127b7('bum): 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo
128a1('bum): rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa de dag gi

128a4('bum): brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mi 'jigs pa

128a6('bum): par rig pa bzhi bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can
128a7('bum): gzhan gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa chen po bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang
128b1('bum): byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byams pa chen po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byams pa chen po bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas
