218a5('bum): gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhe'am/ bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhe'am/ bdag gis
218a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhe'am/ bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par
218a7('bum): bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhe'am/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
218b1('bum): pa'o zhe'am/ bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi phyir stong pa nyid do zhe'am/
218b2('bum): bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi phyir nang stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
218b3('bum): do zhe'am/ bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi chen po stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi don
218b4('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi 'dus byas stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa
218b5('bum): nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi mtha' las
218b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis
218b7('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi rang
219a1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid de zhe'am/ bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi chos thams cad stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag
219a2('bum): gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/
219a3('bum): bdag gi mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyad bar bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis ngo bo
219a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi dngos
219a5('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'o zhe'am/ bdag gis yang
219a6('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o zhe'am/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi rdzu 'phrul
219a7('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi'o zhe'am/ bdag gis dbang po lnga la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi dbang po lnga'o zhe'am/ bdag gis stobs lnga la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi stobs lnga'o
219b1('bum): zhe'am| bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no zhe'am/ bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par
219b2('bum): bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o zhe'am/ bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'o zhe'am/
219b3('bum): bdag gis bsam gtan bzhi la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi bsam gtan bzhi'o zhe'am/ bdag gis tshad med pa bzhi la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi tshad med pa bzhi'o
219b4('bum): zhe'am| bdag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o zhe'am/ bdag gis rnam par thar
219b5('bum): pa brgyad la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi rnam pa thar pa brgyad do zhe'am/ bdag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi mthar
219b6('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o zhe'am/ bdag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi
219b7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o zhe'am/ bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi mngon par
220a1('bum): shes pa rnams so zhe'am/ bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams so zhe'am/ bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo
220a2('bum): rnams la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhe'am/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi de bzhin gshegs
220a3('bum): pa'i stobs bcu'o zhe'am/ bdag gis mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o zhe'am/ bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyad
220a4('bum): par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o zhe'am/ bdag gis byams pa che po la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi byams pa chen po'o zhe'am/ bdag gis
220a5('bum): snying rje chen po la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi snying rje chen po'o zhe'am/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi sangs
220a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do zhe'am/ bdag gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o zhe'am/ bdag
220a7('bum): gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhe'am/ bdag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad
220b1('bum): par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhe'am/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis
220b2('bum): rang byang chub la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi rang byang chub bo zhe'am/ bdag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi lam gyi rnam pa
220b3('bum): shes pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhe'am/ bdag gis bla na med
220b4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spyad par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bya bar bdag dang / bdag gir byed pa med
220b5('bum): de| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni/ 'dzin pa la mi spyod/ mi 'dzin pa la mi spyod do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de
220b6('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod/ mi 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang
220b7('bum): chub ci la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa'am/ mi 'dzin
221a1('bum): pa'am| ci la'ang spyod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
221a2('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am/ mi 'dzin pa gang la'ang spyod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags te/ bcom ldan
221a3('bum): 'das| dgra bcom pa la yong yang nyal ba ma mchis na/ de'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am/ mi 'dzin pa la/ spyod par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
221a4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyang 'dzin pa'am/ mi 'dzin pa la spyod pa med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
221a5('bum): 'das| gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod/ mi 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod/ gzugs la'ang mi spyod/ tshor ba la'ang
221a6('bum): mi spyod| 'du shes la'ang mi spyod/ 'du byed la'ang mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod/ mig la'ang mi spyod/ rna ba la'ang mi spyod/ sna la'ang mi spyod/ lce la'ang mi spyod/
221a7('bum): lus la'ang mi spyod/ yid la'ang mi spyod/ gzugs la'ang mi spyod/ sgra la'ang mi spyod/ dri la'ang mi spyod/ ro la'ang mi spyod/ reg la'ang mi spyod/ chos la'ang mi spyod/ mig gi
221b1('bum): rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod/ sna'i rnam pa shes pa la'ang mi spyod/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa
221b2('bum): la'ang mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod/
221b3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod/
221b4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod/ lus
221b5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod/ sa'i khams la'ang mi spyod/ chu'i khams la'ang mi spyod/ me'i
221b6('bum): khams la'ang mi spyod/ rlung gi khams la'ang mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams la'ang mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang mi spyod/ ma rig pa la'ang mi spyod/ 'du byed
221b7('bum): la'ang mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod/ ming dang gzugs la'ang mi spyod/ skye mched drug la'ang mi spyod/ reg pa la'ang mi spyod/ tshor ba la'ang mi spyod/ sred pa
222a1('bum): la'ang mi spyod/ len pa la'ang mi spyod/ srid pa la'ang mi spyod/ skye ba la'ang mi spyod/ rga shi la'ang mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod/
222a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
222a3('bum): phyin pa la'ang mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ stong
222a4('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
222a5('bum): nyid la'ang mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ rang bzhin
222a6('bum): stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ dngos po med
222a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod/
222b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi la'ang mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod/ dbang po lnga la'ang mi spyod/ stobs lnga la'ang mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la'ang mi spyod/
222b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod/ bsam gtan bzhi la'ang mi spyod/ tshad med pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod/ gzugs
222b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la'ang mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la'ang mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i
222b4('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la'ang mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams la'ang mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la'ang mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la'ang
222b5('bum): mi spyod| de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la'ang mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod/ byams pa chen po la'ang mi
222b6('bum): spyod| snying rje chen po la'ang mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang mi spyod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la'ang mi spyod/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
222b7('bum): la'ang mi spyod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang mi spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/ rang byang chub la'ang mi spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la'ang mi spyod/
223a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang mi spyod na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod/ stong pa
223a2('bum): nyid bcu bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
223a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
223a4('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bgyis/ mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas/
223a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gyis/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyis/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
223a6('bum): dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su bsgrubs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol
223a7('bum): tu phyin pa drug lam spyad/ stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la ma spyad/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la ma spyad/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum lam spyad/ bsam
223b1('bum): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad lam spyad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lam spyad/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la
223b2('bum): ma spyad| so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma spyad/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po lam spyad/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma spyad/ byang chub sems
223b3('bum): dpa' sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis/ mngon par shes pa lnga la ma gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
223b4('bum): dag par ma bgyis/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma bgyis/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su ma bsgrubs par
223b5('bum): ni| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin
223b6('bum): no| |de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par ma byas/ stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
223b7('bum): rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / de bzhin
224a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
224a2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su ma rdzogs/ mngon par shas pa lnga la ma gnas/ byang chub sems
224a3('bum): dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
224a4('bum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu yongs su ma bsgrubs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ rab 'byor/ byang
224a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
224a6('bum): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
224a7('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
224b1('bum): 'jug pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
224b2('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas/ mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
224b3('bum): med par zhugs/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po
224b4('bum): brgyad cu yongs su bsgrubs/ mi nyams pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
224b5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de'ang gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ 'du shes kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rnam
224b6('bum): par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ mig gi rang bzhin la gnas/ rna ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ sna'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lce'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lus kyi rang bzhin
224b7('bum): la gnas/ yid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ sgra'i rang bzhin la gnas/ dri'i rang bzhin la gnas/ ro'i rang bzhin la gnas/ reg gi rang
225a1('bum): bzhin la gnas/ chos kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/
225a2('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
225a3('bum): rang bzhin la gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lce'i
225a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
225a5('bum): gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/
225a6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
225a7('bum): ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ me'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/
225b1('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ ma rig pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rnam par shes
225b2('bum): pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ skye mched drug gi rang bzhin la gnas/ reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ sred
225b3('bum): pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ len pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ srid pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ skye ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ rga shi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
225b4('bum): tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
225b5('bum): rang bzhin la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ phyi stong
225b6('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ don dam pa stong
225b7('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la
226a1('bum): gnas| thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ chos
226a2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ dngos po med pa stong pa
226a3('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rang
226a4('bum): bzhin la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin la gnas/ stobs lnga'i rang
226a5('bum): bzhin la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rang bzhin la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i rang
226a6('bum): bzhin la gnas/ bsam gtan bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ tshad med pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/
226a7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
226b1('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin la
226b2('bum): gnas| de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ byams pa
226b3('bum): chen po'i rang bzhin la gnas/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin
226b4('bum): la gnas/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin la gnas/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin la gnas/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rang byang chub kyi
226b5('bum): rang bzhin la gnas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
226b6('bum): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rang bzhin de'ang nye bar zhi ba ste/ chos gang yang 'phel bar byed pa'am/ 'grib par
226b7('bum): byed pa'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ thob pa'am/ mngon par rdzogs par byed pa med de/ de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad
227a1('bum): du btags pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
227a2('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /don dam par ni/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ mig gam/ rna ba'am/ sna'am/ lce'am/ lus sam/
227a3('bum): yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra'am/ dri'am/ ro'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'am/
227a4('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg
227a5('bum): pa'am| lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
227a6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/
227a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par
227b1('bum): shes pa'i khams sam/ ma reg pa'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa'am/ tshor ba'am/ sred pa'am/ len
227b2('bum): pa'am| srid pa'am/ skye ba'am/ rga shi'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi
227b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong
227b4('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
227b5('bum): nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
227b6('bum): nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
227b7('bum): sam| yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i
228a1('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
228a2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
228a3('bum): dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs
228a4('bum): pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
228a5('bum): 'bras bu'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na med
228a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/ gang byang chub tu spyod pa'i chos de lta bu'ang med de/ chos de dag thams cad ni/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste/ btags pa yin
228a7('bum): gyi| don dam bar ni/ ma yin no/ /de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub tu spyod kyang sems de dag mi
228b1('bum): dmigs te/ sems can rnams kyang mi dmigs/ byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du
228b2('bum): sems| gang gi tshe rab 'byor khyod kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang ba'i phyir dbang po rnams thob par gyur pa dang / bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin tam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
228b3('bum): 'thob pa'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa de'i tshe rmi lam mam/ sems sam/ lam mam/ 'bras
228b4('bum): bu dmigs par 'gyur pa yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na/ ji ltar khyod rab 'byor gyis dgra bcom
228b5('bum): pa thob bo zhes bya bar bka' stsal te lung bstan par gyur/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste bkas lung bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
228b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /tshor ba'ang 'jig
228b7('bum): rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /'du shes kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /'du byed kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad
229a1('bum): du btags pa'o/ /mig kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rna ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /sna'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du
229a2('bum): btags pa'o/ /lce'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /lus kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /yid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /gzugs kyang
229a3('bum): 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /sgra'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /dri'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /ro'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /reg
229a4('bum): kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /chos kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par
229a5('bum): shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /
229a6('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi
229a7('bum): tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang
229b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus
229b2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
229b3('bum): tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang
229b4('bum): 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /sa'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /
229b5('bum): chu'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /me'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rlung gi khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /nam
229b6('bum): mkha'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /ma rig pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags
229b7('bum): pa'o| |'du byed kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags
230a1('bum): pa'o| |skye mched drug kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha
230a2('bum): snyad du btags pa'o/ /sred pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /len pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /srid pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags
230a3('bum): pa'o| |skye ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rga shi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags
230a4('bum): pa'o| |tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /brtson
230a5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
230a6('bum): pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa
230a7('bum): nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /
230b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brtags pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags
230b2('bum): pa'o| |mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong
230b3('bum): pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags
230b4('bum): pa'o| |rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa
230b5('bum): nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad
230b6('bum): du btags pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi
230b7('bum): rkang pa rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /dbang po lnga'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /stobs lnga'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /byang chub kyi
231a1('bum): yan lag bdun kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /'phags pa'i
231a2('bum): bden pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brtags pa'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /gzugs
231a3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
231a4('bum): pa dgu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /mngon
231a5('bum): par shes pa rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du
231a6('bum): btags pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig
231a7('bum): pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /byams pa chen po'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /snying rje chen po'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
231b1('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang 'jig rten
231b2('bum): gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyis tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rang byang chub kyang 'jig rten
231b3('bum): gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam ba shes pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ /byang chub
231b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ chos gang la'ang 'phel bar byed pa'am/ 'grib par byed pa'am/ phan 'dogs pa'am/ gnod par byed pa de lta bu gang yang ma dmigs te/
231b5('bum): chos kyi rang bzhin nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos kyi rang bzhin de'ang ma dmigs na/ sems dang po bskyed pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /sa bcu'i bar du
231b6('bum): dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
231b7('bum): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci
232a1('bum): smos to| de ni/ gnas med do/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
232a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog
232a3('bum): ma dang / tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs
232a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas
232a5('bum): med do| |dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/
232a6('bum): de ni| gnas med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /dbang po lnga dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de
232a7('bum): ni| gnas med do/ /stobs lnga dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/
232b1('bum): gnas med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/
232b2('bum): de ni| gnas med do/ /bsam gtan bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /tshad med pa bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /
232b3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas
232b4('bum): med do| |mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
232b5('bum): smon pa med pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /ting nge 'dzin
232b6('bum): rnams dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
232b7('bum): bcu dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
233a1('bum): dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /byams pa chen po dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /snying rje chen po
233a2('bum): dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /rgyun du zhugs
233a3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /phyir
233a4('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /rang byang chub
233a5('bum): dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /rnam pa thams cad
233a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
233a7('bum): byang chub tu spyod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
233b1('bum): brgya ba las/ le'u drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya gya dgu pa/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
233b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu
233b3('bum): bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge
233b4('bum): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la
233b5('bum): spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la
233b6('bum): spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par
233b7('bum): bgyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
234a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
234a2('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang
234a3('bum): sbyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po dang / len pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de dag las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi
234a4('bum): lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla
234a5('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
234a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/
234a7('bum): de'i 'tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
234b1('bum): spyod na| thabs mkhas pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
234b2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang bzod pa dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/
234b3('bum): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de
234b4('bum): ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
234b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang brtson 'grus dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de
234b6('bum): gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
234b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab
235a1('bum): ' byor| gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
235a2('bum): kyang bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob
235a3('bum): par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
235a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
235a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom yang shes rab dang / shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
235a6('bum): dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas
235a7('bum): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
235b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nang stong pa nyid sgom yang nang stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i
235b2('bum): tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
235b3('bum): spyod na| thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
235b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe phyi stong pa nyid sgom yang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi
235b5('bum): spyod na| de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
235b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/
235b7('bum): gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom yang phyi nang stong pa
236a1('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
236a2('bum): dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na
236a3('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
236a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub
236a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs
236a6('bum): mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
236a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chen po stong pa nyid sgom yang chen po stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe
236b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs
236b2('bum): mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
236b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom yang don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe
236b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs
236b5('bum): mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
236b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems
236b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na
237a1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
237a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang
237a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs
237a4('bum): mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
237a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las
237a6('bum): gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
237a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems
237b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom yang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom
237b2('bum): pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
237b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par lam rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
237b4('bum): yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
237b5('bum): sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
237b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
237b7('bum): yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/
238a1('bum): chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
238a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
238a3('bum): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid
238a4('bum): dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par
238a5('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
238a6('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
238a7('bum): sgom yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
238b1('bum): chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag
238b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mi dmigs
238b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid sgom yang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
238b4('bum): chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
238b5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe dngos po med pa stong pa
238b6('bum): nyid sgom yang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
238b7('bum): po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par
239a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
239a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub
239a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/
239a4('bum): thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
239a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang
239a6('bum): mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' chen
239a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor
239b1('bum): gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / dran pa nye
239b2('bum): bar gzhag pa sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang
239b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
239b4('bum): rgya'o| |rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom yang yang dag par spong ba rnams
239b5('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab
239b6('bum): 'byor| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
239b7('bum): pa'i 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
240a1('bum): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi
240a2('bum): lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
240a3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dbang po lnga
240a4('bum): sgom yang dbang po rnams dang / dbang po sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob
240a5('bum): par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
240a6('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe stobs lnga sgom yang stobs
240a7('bum): rnams dang / stobs sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab
240b1('bum): 'byor| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
240b2('bum): rab 'byor| gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / byang
240b3('bum): chub kyi yan lag sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang
240b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab
240b5('bum): ' byor| gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom yang 'phags pa'i lam yan
240b6('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags ba'i lam yan lag brgyad ba sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang
240b7('bum): chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par
241a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
241a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe
241a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs
241a4('bum): mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
241a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtan bzhi sgom yang bsam gtan rnams dang / bsam gtan sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang
241a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/
241a7('bum): thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
241b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshad med pa bzhi sgom yang tshad med pa rnams dang / tshad med pa sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems
241b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas
241b3('bum): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
241b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sgom pa'ang
241b5('bum): mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
241b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/
241b7('bum): gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom yang rnam par thar pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
242a1('bum): sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab
242a2('bum): 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
242a3('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
242a4('bum): par 'jug pa dgu sgom yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las
242a5('bum): gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
242a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
242a7('bum): yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
242b1('bum): sgom yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa'ang mi
242b2('bum): dmigs| chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
242b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab
242b4('bum): 'byor| gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams sgom yang mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/
242b5('bum): chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab
242b6('bum): 'byor| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
242b7('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom yang ting nge 'dzin rnams
243a1('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi
243a2('bum): lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par
243a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
243a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
243a5('bum): dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas
243a6('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
243a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos
243b1('bum): de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
243b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang
243b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom yang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/
243b4('bum): chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
243b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam
243b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
243b7('bum): par rig pa sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/
244a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
244a2('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byams pa chen po sgom yang byams pa chen po
244a3('bum): dang / byams pa chen po sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab
244a4('bum): 'byor| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
244a5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po sgom yang snying rje chen po dang /
244a6('bum): snying rje chen po sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/
244a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
244b1('bum): 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom yang sangs
244b2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa sgom pa'ang mi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang
244b3('bum): chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
244b4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
244b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi lam la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems
244b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas gzugs mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyor ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i
244b7('bum): gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshor ba mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyor ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do/ /'du shes mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de
245a1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i 'du shes la ngo bo nyid med do/ /'du byed mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
245a2('bum): gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i 'du byed la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rnam par shes pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rnam par
245a3('bum): shes pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /mig mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i mig la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rna ba mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir
245a4('bum): zhe na| de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rna ba la ngo bo nyid med do/ /sna mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i sna la ngo bo nyid
245a5('bum): med do/ /lce mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i lce la ngo bo nyid med do/ /lus mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
245a6('bum): gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i lus la ngo bo nyid med do/ /yid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i yid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /gzugs
245a7('bum): mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do/ /sgra mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar
245b1('bum): ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i sgra la ngo bo nyid med do/ /dri mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i dri la ngo bo nyid med do/ /ro mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir
245b2('bum): zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i ro la ngo bo nyid med do/ /reg mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i reg la ngo bo
245b3('bum): nyid med do/ /chos mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i chos la ngo bo nyid med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ de ci'i
245b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
245b5('bum): gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya
245b6('bum): ba'i sna'i rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i lce'i rnam par shes pa la ngo bo
245b7('bum): nyid med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /yid kyi rnam par
246a1('bum): shes pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /mig gi 'dus te
246a2('bum): reg pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/
246a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang
246a4('bum): sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i lce'i
246a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /
246a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
246a7('bum): tshor ba mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
246b1('bum): gyis tshor ba mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
246b2('bum): tshor ba mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
246b3('bum): ba mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
246b4('bum): ba mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
246b5('bum): tshor ba mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do/ /sa'i khams mi sbyor mi 'byed
246b6('bum): de| de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i sa'i khams la ngo bo nyid med do/ /chu'i khams mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/
246b7('bum): dbye bar bya ba'i chu'i khams la ngo bo nyid med do/ /me'i khams mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i me'i khams la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rlung
247a1('bum): gi khams mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rlung gi khams la ngo bo nyid med do/ /nam mkha'i khams mi sbyor
247a2('bum): mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i nam mkha'i khams la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
247a3('bum): de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la ngo bo nyid med do/ /ma rig pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye
247a4('bum): bya ba'i ma rig pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /'du byed mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i 'du byed la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rnam par shes
247a5('bum): pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /ming dang gzugs mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe
247a6('bum): na| de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i ming dang gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do/ /skye mched drug mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar
247a7('bum): bya ba'i skye mched drug la ngo bo nyid med do/ /reg pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshor ba mi sbyor mi 'byed
247b1('bum): mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do/ /sred pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye
247b2('bum): bar bya ba'i sred pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /len pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i len pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /srid pa mi sbyor mi 'byed
247b3('bum): de| de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i srid pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /skye ba mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya
247b4('bum): ba'i skye ba la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rga shi mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bye ba'i rga shi la ngo bo nyid med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/
247b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/
