247b6('bum): 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/
247b7('bum): dbye bar bya ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i brtson
248a1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i
248a2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha
248a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /nang stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i nang stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid
248a4('bum): mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i phyi stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/
248a5('bum): 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i phyi nang stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar
248a6('bum): bya ba'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i chen po stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid
248a7('bum): med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid
248b1('bum): mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
248b2('bum): ni| 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/
248b3('bum): dbye bar bya ba'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i thog ma
248b4('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid
248b5('bum): med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi
248b6('bum): sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i
248b7('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
249a1('bum): gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang
249a2('bum): sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i ngo
249a3('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
249a4('bum): la ngo bo nyid med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid med do/ /yang
249a5('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i yang dag par spong ba bzhi la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi sbyor mi 'byed
249a6('bum): de| de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid med do/ /dbang po lnga mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang
249a7('bum): sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i dbang po lnga la ngo bo nyid med do/ /stobs lnga mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i stobs lnga la ngo bo nyid
249b1('bum): med do| |byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la ngo bo nyid med do/ /'phags pa'i lam
249b2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
249b3('bum): bzhi mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid med do/ /bsam gtan bzhi mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i
249b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i bsam gtan bzhi la ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshad med pa bzhi mi sbyor ma 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/
249b5('bum): dbye bar bya ba'i tshad med pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i
249b6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rnam par
249b7('bum): thar pa brgyad la ngo bo nyid med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang skyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i mthar gyis gnas
250a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
250a2('bum): de ni| 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams mi sbyor mi 'byed de/
250a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
250a4('bum): gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la ngo bo nyid med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i
250a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ngo bo nyid med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
250a6('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la ngo bo nyid med do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med
250a7('bum): do| |so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do/ /byams
250b1('bum): pa chen po mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i byams pa chen po la ngo bo nyid med do/ /snying rje chen po mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
250b2('bum): ni| 'di ltar gang sbyar ba'am/ dbye bar bya ba'i snying rje chen po la ngo bo nyid med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang sbyar ba
250b3('bum): 'am| dbye bar bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ngo bo nyid med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos gang la'ang gang sbyor ba'am/ dbye bar bgyi ba'i ngo bo nyid ma mchis
250b4('bum): na| gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar mngon par 'grub par 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslab
250b5('bum): par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
250b6('bum): pa| shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang
250b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ de'ang thabs mkhas par yin gyi/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gal te byang chub sems
251a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos gang la la zhig gi ngo bo nyid dmigs na ni/ de'i phyir 'dzin par yang 'gyur na/ 'on te
251a2('bum): mi dmigs na/ 'di ni/ gzugs so/ /'di ni/ tshor ba'o/ /'di ni/ 'du shes so/ /'di ni/ 'du byed do/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'o/ /zhes bya bar yang ci zhig gzung / 'di dag ni/ skye mched
251a3('bum): rnams so/ /'di dag ni khams rnams so/ /'di dag ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /'di dag ni/ ma rig pa'o/ /'di ni/ 'du byed do/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni/ ming dang
251a4('bum): gzugs so/ /'di ni/ skye mched drug go /'di ni/ reg pa'o/ /'di ni/ tshor ba'o/ /'di ni/ sred pa'o/ /'di ni/ len pa'o/ /'di ni/ srid pa'o/ /'di ni/ skye ba'o/ /'di ni/ rga shi'o/ /'di ni/
251a5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha
251a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o/ 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di
251a7('bum): ni| chen po stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di
251b1('bum): ni| thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /
251b2('bum): 'di ni| mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di dag ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
251b3('bum): bzhi'o/ /'di dag ni/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o/ /'di dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o/ /'di dag ni dbang po lnga'o/ /'di dag ni/ stobs lnga'o/ /'di dag ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no/ /
251b4('bum): 'di dag ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'o/ /'di dag ni/ bsam gtan bzhi'o/ /'di dag ni/ tshad med pa bzhi'o/ /'di dag ni/ gzugs med
251b5('bum): par snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o/ /'di dag ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /'di dag ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /'di dag ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
251b6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /'di dag ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /'di dag ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs
251b7('bum): pa'i stobs bcu'o/ /'di dag ni/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o/ /'di dag ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o/ /'di ni/ byams pa chen po'o/ /'di ni/ snying rje chen po'o/ /'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
252a1('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do/ /'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di ni/ dgra
252a2('bum): bcom pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ rang byang chub bo/ /'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /zhes bya bar yang ci zhig gzung ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab
252a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
252a4('bum): pa ni| gzung du med pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /phyi stong pa
252a5('bum): nyid ni| gzung du med pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/
252a6('bum): gzung du med pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha
252a7('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med
252b1('bum): pa'o| |rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du
252b2('bum): med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi
252b3('bum): rkang pa bzhi ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /stobs lnga ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
252b4('bum): brgyad pa ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i
252b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i
252b6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo
252b7('bum): rnams ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /
253a1('bum): byams pa chen po ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /snying rje chen po ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
253a2('bum): bu| de ni/ gzung du med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ste/ de la slob pa'i
253a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ bslab pa'ang mi dmigs na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lta ci smos/ byang chub lta'ang ci smos/ byang chub kyi chos rnams lta'ang
253a4('bum): ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta'ang ci smos/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta'ang ci smos/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams lta'ang ci smos/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams lta'ang ci smos/
253a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni/ 'di ltar chos gang la'ang ngo bo nyid med do/ /de ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la so so'i skye bo'i chos ni/ gang / rgyun du zhugs pa
253a6('bum): ni| gang zhig yod/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba ni/ gang zhig yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba ni/ gang zhig yod/ dgra bcom pa ni/ gang zhig yod/ rang sangs rgyas ni/ gang zhig yod/ byang chub sems
253a7('bum): dpa' ni/ gang zhig yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ gang zhig yod/ gal te gang zag de dag dmigs su med na/ chos gang gis so so'i skye
253b1('bum): bo'am| rgyun du zhugs pa'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
253b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar brjod pa'i chos de dag 'byung bar yang ga la 'gyur/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis
253b3('bum): brgya dgu bcu pa/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa la 'di ni/ so so'i skye bo'o/ /zhes bgyi ba nas 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
253b4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bgyi ba'i bar du 'byung ba ci'i skad du dmigs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci gzugs kyi dngos po gang la byis
253b5('bum): pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags
253b6('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci tshor ba'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par
253b7('bum): 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci 'du shes kyi dngos po gsal byis pa
254a1('bum): so so'i skye ba rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par
254a2('bum): de ni| ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci 'du byed kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod
254a3('bum): par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci
254a4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
254a5('bum): phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci mig gi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par
254a6('bum): gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
254a7('bum): stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci rna ba'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/
254b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci sna'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par
254b2('bum): zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtags par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
254b3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci lce'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhan par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol
254b4('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci lus kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon
254b5('bum): par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci lag ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
254b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci yid kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/
254b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtags par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci gzugs kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
255a1('bum): mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma
255a2('bum): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci sgra'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur
255a3('bum): tam| yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci dri'i
255a4('bum): dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma
255a5('bum): gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci ro'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu
255a6('bum): yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
255a7('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci reg gi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom
255b1('bum): ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci chos kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen
255b2('bum): par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
255b3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par
255b4('bum): 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i dngos
255b5('bum): po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par
255b6('bum): de ni| ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci sna'i rnam par shes pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod
255b7('bum): dam| yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
256a1('bum): ci lce'i rnam par shes pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol
256a2('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so
256a3('bum): so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /
256a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci yod kyi rnam par shes pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par
256a5('bum): gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci mig gi 'dus
256a6('bum): te reg pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log
256a7('bum): ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par
256b1('bum): gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
256b2('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/

256b4('bum): bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom

262a1('bum): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur

262a6('bum): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/

262b1('bum): ci dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom
262b2('bum): ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i
262b3('bum): skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom
262b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod
262b5('bum): par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
262b6('bum): kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs
262b7('bum): par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci dbang po rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/
263a1('bum): yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
263a2('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci stobs rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom
263a3('bum): ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so
263a4('bum): so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma
263a5('bum): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa
263a6('bum): de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
263a7('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/
263b1('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci bsam gtan rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa
263b2('bum): so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags
263b3('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci tshad med pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur
263b4('bum): tam| yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci gzugs med
263b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom
263b6('bum): ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci rnam par thar pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo
263b7('bum): rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan
264a1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen
264a2('bum): par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
264a3('bum): stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod
264a4('bum): dam| yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i
264a5('bum): bu| ci mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom
264a6('bum): ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
264a7('bum): mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
264b1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur
264b2('bum): ram| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
264b3('bum): kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs
264b4('bum): par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod
264b5('bum): dam| yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtags par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
264b6('bum): ci so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhan par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom
264b7('bum): ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci byams pa chen po'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye ba rnams
265a1('bum): mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags
265a2('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci snying rje chen po'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod
265a3('bum): par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
265a4('bum): pa bco brgyad kyi dngos po la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin
265a5('bum): ci log ma gtogs par de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa la phyin ci log
265a6('bum): gi dbang gis sems can rnams rnam par rtog ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas chos thams
265a7('bum): cad dngos po med par mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug go / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ thabs mkhas pa gang gis byang chub sems
265b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug pa'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom
265b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos gang yang gang la thogs par 'gyur
265b3('bum): ba'i dngos po'am/ gang la thogs par gyur nas zhum par 'gyur ba'am/ zhum par gyur nas sgyid lug par 'gyur ba'am/ sgyid lug par gyur nas chi chad par 'gyur ba'am/ tshi chad par
265b4('bum): gyur nas le lor 'gyur ba'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can rnams rmongs pas phung po zhes bya ba'am/ khams zhes bya ba'am/ skye mched ces bya ba'am/
265b5('bum): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'am/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs par chos thams cad ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /srog med pa'o/ /srog
265b6('bum): dang bral ba'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o/ /de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
265b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong nas sgyu ma'i mkhan po lta bu'i lus byin
266a1('bum): gyis brlabs nas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sems can gang ser sna can du gyur pa de dag la sbyin pa'i gtam byed do/ /tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams la tshul khrims
266a2('bum): kyi gtam byed do/ /gnod sems can rnams la bzod pa'i gtam byed do/ /le lo can rnams la brtson 'grus kyi gtam byed do/ /sems g.yeng ba rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi gtam byed do/ /shes
266a3('bum): rab 'chal ba can rnams la shes rab kyi gtam byed do/ /gang gi tshe sems can de dag sbyin pa la bkod par gyur pa dang / tshul khrims bkod par gyur pa dang / bzod pa la bkod par
266a4('bum): gyur pa dang / brtson 'grus la bkod par gyur pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la bkod par gyur pa dang / shes rab la bkod par gyur pa de'i tshe de las gong du sems can de dag la 'phags
266a5('bum): pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob
266a6('bum): par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
266a7('bum): nyid thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gtam byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de ltar sems
266b1('bum): can ma mchis shing yang dag par ma mchis pa rnams sbyin pa la sbyor/ tshul khrims la sbyor/ bzod pa la sbyor/ brtson 'grus la sbyor/ ting nge 'dzin la sbyor/ shes rab la sbyor zhing de
266b2('bum): las gong du 'phags pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi
266b3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa
266b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gtam bgyid na/ ji ltar dmigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang
266b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dmigs pa gang yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
266b6('bum): chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe kun rdzob kyi brdas tha snyad du spyod pa ma gtogs par sems can gang yang mi dmigs te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la byang chub sems
266b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa gnyis la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston kyang shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs pa
267a1('bum): gnyis la sems can du dmigs pa med de/ sems can du gdags pa'ang med do/ /'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas
267a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams la chos ston na/ des sems can de dag tshe 'di nyid la bdag tu mi dmigs na/ gang thob par bya ba dang / gang gis thob
267a3('bum): par bya ba lta ci smos te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la
267a4('bum): chos ston to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang yang gcig pa'am/ tha dad par yang mi dmigs pas de lta bu'i go cha 'tshal
267a5('bum): ba dang / go cha 'tshal bas 'dod pa'i khams na'ang mi gda'/ gzugs mchis pa'i khams na'ang mi gda'/ gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams na'ang mi gda'/ 'dus byas kyi khams
267a6('bum): na'ang mi gda'/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams na'ang mi gda' la/ sems can rnams kyang khams gsum nas 'grol cing sems can du'ang mi dmigs/ sems can du gdags pa'ang mi
267a7('bum): dmigs pa de ni/ spro ba chen po dang ldan pa ste/ sems can du gdags pa ma mchis pas sems can bcings pa dang grol ba ma mchis/ sems can bcings pa dang grol ba ma mchis pas
267b1('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pas lam gyi rgyud rnams tha dad pa ma mchis/ lam gyi rgyud rnams tha dad pa ma
267b2('bum): mchis pa la las dang nyon mongs pa ma mchis te/ las dang nyon mongs pa ma mchis na/ rnam par smin pa gang gis bdag gam sems can 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i rnam
267b3('bum): par smin pa de lta bu'ang ga las mchi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ tshig ji skad du brjod pa bzhin te/ gal te sngon sems can zhig byung
267b4('bum): bar gyur la phyis 'byung ba med par gyur tam/ 'o na/ de ni/ de bzhin du sngon yod pa las phyis med par gyur tam/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba sngon yod la phyis med par gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
267b5('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la'ang 'das pa de lta bur gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos
267b6('bum): de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
267b7('bum): dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de la bdag kyang med/ sems can yang med/ srog kyang med/ 'gro ba'ang med/ gso ba'ang med/ skyes bu
268a1('bum): bu'ang med/ gang zag kyang med/ shed can yang med/ shed bdag kyang med/ byed pa po'ang med/ tshor ba po'ang med/ shes pa po'ang med/ mthong ba po'ang med
268a2('bum): na| de la gzugs lta ga la yod/ tshor ba lta ga la yod/ 'du shes lta ga la yod/ 'du byed lta ga la yod/ rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/ mig lta ga la yod/ rna ba lta ga la yod/
268a3('bum): sna lta ga la yod/ lce lta ga la yod/ lus lta ga la yod/ yid lta ga la yod/ gzugs lta ga la yod/ sgra lta ga la yod/ dri lta ga la yod/ ro lta ga la yod/ reg lta ga la yod/
268a4('bum): chos lta ga la yod/ mig gi rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/ lce'i rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/
268a5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa lta ga la yod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa lta ga la yod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa
268a6('bum): lta ga la yod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa lta ga la yod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lta ga la yod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lta ga la yod/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lta ga la
268a7('bum): yod| rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lta ga la yod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lta ga la yod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lta ga la yod/ lus kyi
268b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lta ga la yod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lta ga la yod/ sa'i khams lta ga la yod/ chu'i khams lta ga la yod/ me'i khams lta ga la yod/ rlung
268b2('bum): gi khams lta ga la yod/ nam mkha'i khams lta ga la yod/ rnam par shes pa'i khams lta ga la yod/ ma rig pa lta ga la yod/ 'du byed lta ga la yod/ rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/ ming
268b3('bum): dang gzugs lta ga la yod/ skye mched drug lta ga la yod/ reg pa lta ga la yod/ tshor ba lta ga la yod/ sred pa lta ga la yod/ len pa lta ga la yod/ srid pa lta ga la yod/ skye ba lta ga la yod/
268b4('bum): rga shi lta ga la yod/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams lta'ang ga la yod de/ chos de dag med na 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba gang nas sems can rnams dgrol bar bya ba de lta bu dag lta'ang
268b5('bum): ga la yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las de lta bu'i chos ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de dag thos nas sems can
268b6('bum): rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste/ phyin ci log gi byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs par sems can nam/ chos gang
268b7('bum): yang dmigs pa med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de lta bu'i go cha chen po gyon te/ go cha de bgos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
269a1('bum): phyir mi ldog ste/ bdag gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar bya ba ma yin gyi/ gdon mi za bar bdag gis bla na
269a2('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can rnams kyi don chos bzhin du byas te/ don
269a3('bum): bya ba des sems can rnams phyin ci log las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sprul pa'i skyes bu zhig gis srog
269a4('bum): chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po sprul te bza' ba dang / bca' ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba shin tu mang bas tshim par byas te/ de ltar tshim par byas nas bdag gis ni/ bsod nams
269a5('bum): mang po spel to/ /bdag gis ni/ bsod nams mang po spel to/ /zhes ched du brjod na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ de la la la zhig bstan te tshim par byas pa'am/ la las
269a6('bum): bsod nams 'phel bar byas pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
269a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
269b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa
269b2('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la
269b3('bum): spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
269b4('bum): la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
269b5('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran
269b6('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / dbang po lnga la spyod pa dang / stobs lnga la spyod pa dang / byang
269b7('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa dang / tshad med
270a1('bum): pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
270a2('bum): pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
270a3('bum): cad la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
270a4('bum): bzhi la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par
270a5('bum): byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshe sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ sems can la la zhig dmigs par byas shing gdul bar bya ba de lta bu'i
270a6('bum): sems can gang yang mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya go gcig pa/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom
270a7('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyi lam gang la spyad de sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /
270b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang
270b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
270b3('bum): pa la spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la
270b4('bum): spyod| phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
270b5('bum): la spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod/ chos thams cad
270b6('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo
270b7('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod/ dbang po lnga la spyod/ stobs lnga la spyod/ byang
271a1('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod/ bsam gtan bzhi la spyod/ tshad
271a2('bum): med pa bzhi la spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod/ rnam par
271a3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod/ mngon par shes pa lnga la spyod/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod/
271a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod/ byams pa chen po la spyod/ snying rje chen po la spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi
271a5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod cing / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang
271a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
271a7('bum): 'byor| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ sbyin pa byin nas 'di skad
271b1('bum): du 'doms shing rjes su ston te/ rigs kyi bu dag /sbyin pa la gzung bsam 'dzin cig /sbyin pa la gzung bas 'dzin cing lus gang mngon par grub pas/ sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur
271b2('bum): ba de lta bu'i lus mngon par grub pa re/ rigs kyi bu dag/ 'di la don dam par na sbyin pa'ang med/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang med/ sbyin pa'i bdag po'ang med/ len pa'ang med de/ chos
271b3('bum): de dag thams cad ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos ni/ len pa med de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /zhes 'doms shing rjes su ston te/ rab
271b4('bum): 'byor| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de ltar sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang sbyin pa mi dmigs so/ /sbyin
271b5('bum): pa'i bdag po mi dmigs so/ /len pa mi dmigs so/ /de ni/ mi dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de chos gsum po de dag thams cad mi dmigs pas/
271b6('bum): sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor ro/ /rang byang chub
271b7('bum): la sbyor ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la sbyor ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sbyor ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i
272a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /
272a2('bum): sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do/ /sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod de/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
272a3('bum): chen po de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byin zhing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/ /khyim bdag che zhing
272a4('bum): mtho ba'i rigs dang skal pa mnyam par skye'o/ /khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'thob bo/ /de dag na'ang sems can de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su
272a5('bum): sdud de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pas yongs su sdud do/ /de de ltar/ sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can de dag kyang rim gyis
272a6('bum): tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ /bzod pa la rab tu 'god do/ /brtson 'grus la rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/ /shes rab la rab tu 'god do/ /bsam gtan bzhi la
272a7('bum): rab tu 'god do/ /tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/ /yang dag par
272b1('bum): spong ba bzhi la rab tu 'god do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/ /dbang po lnga la rab tu 'god do/ /stobs lnga la rab tu 'god do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rab tu 'god do/ /'phags
272b2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu 'god do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la rab tu 'god do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la
272b3('bum): rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rab tu 'god do/ /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la rab tu 'god do/ /
272b4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rab tu 'god do/ /yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'jug par byed do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/ /phyir
272b5('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rang byang chub thob par byed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul lo/ /kye skyes bu
272b6('bum): dag / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi dka' ste/ phyin ci log gis rmongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pa ma gtogs
272b7('bum): par chos gang la sems can rnams chags par gyur pa'i chos de lta bu gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa med kyi/ phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad rgyun chod la/ 'khor ba las bdag cag kyang
273a1('bum): thar par gyis shig / gzhan yang thar par gyis shig /da ltar khyed bdag cag kyang don chen po gyis shig /gzhan yang de na chen po la sbyor cig /ces yang dag
273a2('bum): par skul ba byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang sems dang po bskyed pa
273a3('bum): nas nye bar bzung ste/ nam yang ngan song du mi ltung ba dang / nam yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mi byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa bon ji lta ba bzhin du
273a4('bum): 'bras bu 'byung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i drung du slongs mo pa gang ji snyed cig 'ongs kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can rnams kyi
273a5('bum): don ma gtogs par gzhan gyi don du 'khor los sgyur ba yongs su ma bzung ngo zhes de la 'di skad ces zer te/ su ci 'dod pa de khyed la byin gyis 'di ni/ nga'i ma yin gyi khyed kyi'o/ /nga ni/
273a6('bum): nang gi gzugs la'ang don du gnyer ba med na/ gzhan lta ci smos te/ gzhan du na ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung gi /bdag ni/ 'khor ba don du gnyer
273a7('bum): ba ma yin no zhes te/ de snying brtse bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / snying rje chen pos sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang sems can gang yongs su grub pa de lta bu mi
273b1('bum): dmigs te/ gzhan du na/ 'du shes dang / ming dang / tha snyad kyis rnam par spyod de/ rnam par spyod pa de'ang sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par spyad du med par shes so/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub
273b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par byas te/ spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang bdag gi sha yan chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma btang ba
273b3('bum): med par bya na/ phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya ba dag lta smos su'ang med pa de ltar spyad par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ yo byad de dag gang
273b4('bum): lags| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yo byad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yo byad do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yo byad
273b5('bum): do| |brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yo byad do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yo byad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yo byad do/ /nang stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /phyi
273b6('bum): stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /'dus byas stong
273b7('bum): pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
274a1('bum): ni| yo byad do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /mi dmigs pa stong
274a2('bum): pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ yo byad do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
274a3('bum): ni| yo byad do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /dbang po rnams ni yo byad do/ /stobs rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /byang chub kyi
274a4('bum): yan lag rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ yo byad do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /bsam gtan rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /tshad
274a5('bum): med pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
274a6('bum): rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni/ yo byad do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/
274a7('bum): yo byad do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni/ yo byad do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ yo
274b1('bum): byad do| |byams pa chen po ni/ yo byad do/ /snying rje chen po ni/ yo byad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ yo byad do/ /de dag ni/ yo byad de/ yo byad de dag gis sems can rnams
274b2('bum): yongs su bsdus shing rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa chen po'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar
274b3('bum): na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar
274b4('bum): na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang
274b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ de sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe 'di skad ces brjod do/ /rigs
274b6('bum): kyi bu dag / tshur sheg /tshul khrims srungs shig /ngas khyed zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal chad dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug
274b7('bum): pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci'ang rung
275a1('bum): ba'i bar gyis phongs pa med par bya'o/ /khyed kyang phongs pas tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod grang na/ khyed yo byad thams cad dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi bar gyis phongs
275a2('bum): pa med par bya'i/ des khyed sdom pa'i tshul khrims la mnos la/ rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pa'am/ theg
275a3('bum): pa gsum po de dag gis sdug bsngal mthar phyin par gyis shig ces nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung ngo / /gzhan yang tshul
275a4('bum): khrims la yang dag par skul lo/ /tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod do/ /sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod de/ /
275a5('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar tshul khrims la sbyar zhing tshul khrims la rab tu bkod de/ rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su
275a6('bum): mya ngan las zlo ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can
275a7('bum): rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu
275b1('bum): phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can gang khro ba dang / gnod sems su byed
275b2('bum): pa dag mthong na/ de dag la 'di skad ces zer ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/ khyed gang gis phongs shing gnod sems su byed par gyur pa de dang
275b3('bum): de nga las longs shig dang / ngas khyed zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang /
275b4('bum): nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar gyis
275b5('bum): phongs pa med par bya'i/ khro ba dang / gnod sems med par gyis shig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can
275b6('bum): de dag bzod pa la sbyar te 'di skad du/ gcugs gang gis khyed kyi khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni/ snying po med pa ste/ de ltar dngos po gang yang med do/ /khro ba de ni/ yang dag pa ma yin par yongs
275b7('bum): su brtags pa ste/ dngos po gang gi phyir khyed 'thab cing 'khon pa dang / gnod sems su byed par gyur pa dang / de ltar 'thab cing 'khon te gnod sems su gyur nas dbyig pas 'gyed pa dang /
276a1('bum): mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang / phan tshun gyi srog la rgal bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang med na/ de lta yin yang khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
276a2('bum): yongs su rtog pas 'khrugs na/ sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ de ma yin
276a3('bum): pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu'ang khyed sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang / tshe zhing rtsub la yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyi/ skyes bu khyed rnams dngos po med pa'i chos
276a4('bum): rnams kyi don du las gang yongs su bzung bas mir skye ba'ang 'thob par mi 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur ba lta smos su'ang med pa de lta bu'i las yongs su ma 'dzin cig /
276a5('bum): grogs po dag /sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni/ dkon no/ /mir skye ba 'thob pa ni/ dkon no/ /dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni/ dkon no/ /'khor ba las thar ba ni/ dkon no/ /de lta yin gyis dal ba
276a6('bum): 'di don med par ma bya zhig / mi khom par gyur cing gsor mi rung bar gyur ta re zhes de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgrub bo/ /gzhan yang bzod
276a7('bum): pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /bzod pa'i legs pa brjod do/ /sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa de dag gi 'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de ltar byang
276b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar bzod pa la sbyar cing / bzod pa la rab tu bkod de/ rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/ rab 'byor/
276b2('bum): de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji
276b3('bum): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la
276b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na 'di skad du/ khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces brjod de/ de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes zer
276b5('bum): na| de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/ kye skyes bu dag /nges sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/ tshul khrims kyi
276b6('bum): rkyen tam/ bzod pa'i rkyen tam/ gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis/ brtson 'grus brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngas nye bar bsgrub par bya'i/ brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas sems
276b7('bum): can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing lus sam/ sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams
277a1('bum): cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo/ /de dag bsgoms pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob
277a2('bum): bo| |lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob po/ /dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob bo/ /rang byang chub 'thob bo/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
277a3('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par
277a4('bum): skul lo| |brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do/ /sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de ltar byang chub
277a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar cing brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod de/ rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/
277a6('bum): rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa
277a7('bum): yin no| |rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba
277b1('bum): yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na 'di skad du/ sems can khyed ci'i phyir bsam gtan
277b2('bum): la mnyam par mi 'jog ces brjod de/ de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems
277b3('bum): can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/ kye sems can dag /ngas rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhes nas byang
277b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrubs te/ de'i phyir de dag rnam
277b5('bum): par rtog pa chad nas bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go / bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go /bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go /bsam gtan
277b6('bum): bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go / byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go /snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go /dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go /btang snyoms la snyom pa par 'jug go /nam
277b7('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /'du shes med 'du
278a1('bum): shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go / de dag bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems
278a2('bum): dul bar gyur pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/ /dbang po lnga sgom mo/ /stobs lnga sgom mo/ /byang chub kyi yan
278a3('bum): lag bdun sgom mo/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo/ /de dag bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
278a4('bum): ste| de la la la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las yongs su mi nyams te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
278a5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
278a6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i
278a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na 'di skad du/ sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab mi sgom zhes brjod do/ de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i
278b1('bum): phyir ro| |zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'doms te/ nga las yo byad rnams longs
278b2('bum): la sbyin pa byin cig / tshul khrims srungs shig /bzod pa sgoms shig /brtson 'grus rtsoms shig /ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cig /rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyis
278b3('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la/ bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ 'gro ba'am/ gso ba'am/ skyes bu'am/ gang zag gam/ shed can nam/ shed bdag
278b4('bum): gam| byed pa po'am/ tshor ba po'am/ shes pa po'am/ mthong ba po'am/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ mig gam/ rna ba'am/
278b5('bum): sna'am| lce'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra'am/ dri'am/ ro'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am/ sna'i
278b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ sna'i
278b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
279a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/
279a2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i
279a3('bum): khams sam/ ma rig pa'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa'am/ tshor ba'am/ sred pa'am/ len pa'am/ srid pa'am/
279a4('bum): skye ba'am/ rga shi'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam
279a5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid
279a6('bum): dam| don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor
279a7('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa
279b1('bum): nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang
279b2('bum): po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/
279b3('bum): tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par
279b4('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs
279b5('bum): pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
279b6('bum): sam| rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
279b7('bum): pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang yid dam/ yongs su rtogs shig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
280a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos gang la dmigs pa mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ de la mngon par zhen par
280a2('bum): med pas chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ 'di ni/
280a3('bum): sems can dmyal ba pa'o/ /'di ni/ byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/ /'di ni/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/ /'di ni/ lha ma yin gyi ris su gtogs pa'o/ /'di ni/ lha'o/ /'di ni/ mi'o/ /
280a4('bum): 'di ni| tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ /'di ni/ tshul khrims ngan pa can no/ /'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ dgra
280a5('bum): bcom pa'o/ /'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'o/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya bar
280a6('bum): rnam par mi rtog ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams
280a7('bum): yongs su sdud pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams
280b1('bum): sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te sems can rnams la 'di skad du 'doms shing rjes su ston to/ /sems
280b2('bum): can khyed ci'i phyir sbyin pa yongs su mi gtong zhes brjod de/ de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes zer na/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di skad ces zer te/ nga
280b3('bum): las yo byad rnams long la sbyin pa byin cig / sbyin pa de la'ang 'dzin pas ma 'dzin cig /sbyin pa de la 'dzin pas 'dzin cing / lus gang mngon par grub pas/ sdug bsngal mang po nyams su
280b4('bum): myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus mngon par grub pa re/ rigs kyi bu dag /'di la don dam par na sbyin pa'ang med/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang med/ sbyin pa'i bdag po 'ang med/ len pa'ang med de/ chos
280b5('bum): de dag thams cad ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos ni/ 'dzin pa med de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ gzung du med pa'o/ /zhes 'doms shing rjes su ston te/ rab 'byor/
280b6('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang de la sbyin par dmigs pa med/ sbyin pa'i
280b7('bum): bdag por dmigs pa med/ len par dmigs pa med do/ /'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dmigs su med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de chos gsum po de dag thams cad
281a1('bum): la mi dmigs pas/ sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor
281a2('bum): ro| |dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor ro/ /rang byang chub la sbyor ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sbyor ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
281a3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang
281a4('bum): dag par skul lo/ /sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do/ /sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de ltar byang chub sems
281a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byin pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba
281a6('bum): mnyam par skye'o/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par bya'o/ /khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob bo/ /de de dag na'ang
281a7('bum): sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su sdud de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don bya ba dang / don mthun pas yongs su sdud do/ /de de ltar sems can
281b1('bum): sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa de dag kyang rim gyis tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ /bzod pa la rab tu 'god do/ /brtson 'grus la rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/ /shes
281b2('bum): rab la rab tu 'god do/ /bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu 'god do/ /tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag
