369a6('bum): pa mdzad cing / de mngon par sprul nas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa de lta bu yod dam med/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

369b1('bum): pa| rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
369b2('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa'ang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin
369b3('bum): te| lus de dag gis sems can rnams ci rigs ci tshul du yongs su smin par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ji snyom du sems/ dgra bcom pas sprul pa mngon par sprul na/ sprul pa des dgra
369b4('bum): bcom pa'i las byas shing / las des gzhan gyi dge ba skye bar 'gyur ba yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de de bzhin te/ mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
369b5('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa'ang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs
369b6('bum): su 'dzin te ci rigs ci tshul du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /de lta bu'i lus des sdug bsngal du'ang mi 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor pa'ang nyams su mi myong ngo / /rab
369b7('bum): 'byor| de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma las glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ glang gi gzugs shig bstan tam/ gzhan yang sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs
370a1('bum): bstan na/ de dag glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ glang gi gzugs sam/ srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag tu'ang 'gyur ba yod dam/ gsol
370a2('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa

370a4('bum): do| |rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes zag pa ma mchis pa dang de ltar ldan zhing
370a5('bum): lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ thabs shin tu mkhas pa ste/ de ni/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
370a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dkar po gang dang gang la gnas shing de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa bgyid kyang las de lta bus mi gos par spyod pa lags/ bcom
370a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod de/
370b1('bum): thabs mkhas pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang des de la gang yang reg par 'gyur ba
370b2('bum): med do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang reg par byed pa dang / gang gis reg par bya ba dang / gang la reg par bya ba de lta bu'i chos

370b4('bum): do| |stong pa nyid kyis chos gang la'ang reg par mi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid kyang reg par bya ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /de
370b5('bum): ni| mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /

370b7('bum): de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su ma chud pa de lta bu yod
371a1('bum): dam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su chos
371a2('bum): thams cad 'du ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa nyid la ni/ chos gang yang khongs su chud pa'am/ khongs su ma chud pa zhes bgyi ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das
371a3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis mi stong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ stong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

371a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa gang la gnas shing phyogs bcu'i phyogs re
371b1('bum): re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
371b2('bum): chos ston pa de dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / chos nyan cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub
371b3('bum): pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
371b4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo / /'jig
371b5('bum): rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo / /gzhan du na ming dang
371b6('bum): brdar gdags pa nye bar bzung zhing bstan pa ma gtogs te/ gdags pa kun kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo / /gal te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong la/ sangs rgyas
371b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong ste/ gdags pa'i rgyud de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong pa zhig yin na ni/ nyi tshe ba'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de'ang stong pa nyi tshe
372a1('bum): pa ma yin no/ /de'i phyir chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ste/ de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas/ shes rab
372a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
372a3('bum): gyi rnam pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa dang / 'chi 'pho shes pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa med par byang chub sems dpa' sems
372a4('bum): dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
372a5('bum): chen po'i byang chub ni/ mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'dus pa ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /de tshol ba'i tshe lha'i mig rnam
372a6('bum): par dag pa mi las 'das pas bdag nyid kyis kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad mthong / gzhan yang dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor te/ dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par zhen
372a7('bum): par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid ni/ gang la mngon par zhen cing / ro myong bar byed par mngon
372b1('bum): par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/ stong pa nyid ni/ ro myong bar byed pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya go bdun pa/ /de ltar byang chub
372b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lha'i mig mngon par sgrub ste/ lha'i mig des chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ste/ de chos de dag
372b3('bum): la gnas shing las mngon par sgrub bo/ /las mngon par sgrub pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sems can nam sems can du gdags par dmigs pa med do/ /de ltar
372b4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis mngon par shes par
372b5('bum): bya ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag byed do/ /de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul
372b6('bum): gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba
372b7('bum): rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ rnam
373a1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
373a2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
373a3('bum): sam| mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi
373a4('bum): chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la
373a5('bum): sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston cing sbyin pa byin cig / phongs pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/
373a6('bum): gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig /gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis
373a7('bum): zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur te re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /tshul
373b1('bum): khrims ngan pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can
373b2('bum): dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyod ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos
373b3('bum): kyi| de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun gnod sems su
373b4('bum): gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi
373b5('bum): 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gang
373b6('bum): gnas yod kyi/ de bas na/ khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji
373b7('bum): snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /le lo ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam
374a1('bum): par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon
374a2('bum): par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos te/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems
374a3('bum): can sems g.yengs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /sems g.yeng ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/
374a4('bum): sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon
374a5('bum): par lta ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal ba can
374a6('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /shes rab 'chal ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal bas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan
374a7('bum): gyi don lta ci smos te/ de ltar na/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar
374b1('bum): khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug
374b2('bum): pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par
374b3('bum): zhugs pa la spyod pa de dag ni/ yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
374b4('bum): khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni/ mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par
374b5('bum): zhen pa med do/ /zhes chos ston te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing
374b6('bum): sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lta'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis
374b7('bum): song zhing sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/
375a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/
375a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
375a3('bum): sam| rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs
375a4('bum): pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs
375a5('bum): rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can
375a6('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig / phongs pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos
375a7('bum): kyi| de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig / gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum
375b1('bum): las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /tshul khrims ngan pa ni/ sdug bsngal
375b2('bum): ba ste| tshul khrims ngan pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi
375b3('bum): skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyod kyis
375b4('bum): tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de
375b5('bum): dag la 'di skad du chos ston te de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig / sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/
375b6('bum): khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi/ de bas na/ khyed
375b7('bum): kyis 'khrugs pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos
376a1('bum): ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /le lo ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa
376a2('bum): ni| sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan

376a6('bum): phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag

376b1('bum): smos te| shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal
376b2('bum): ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe

376b5('bum): la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni/ mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med

377b2('bum): sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ /kye skyes bu
377b3('bum): dag / tshul khrims ngan pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa

377b7('bum): gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i
378a1('bum): 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na/ khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos

380a1('bum): 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ khyed phan tshun du sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/

380b1('bum): gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa

380b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
381a1('bum): chos rnams la ni/ mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
381a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa
381a3('bum): mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/
381a4('bum): bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
381a5('bum): sam| dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
381a6('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/
381a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag
381b1('bum): par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub
381b2('bum): sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di
381b3('bum): skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig /phongs pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin
381b4('bum): pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig / gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re
381b5('bum): zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /tshul khrims ngan pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims
381b6('bum): ngan pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas
381b7('bum): sam| gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims
382a1('bum): ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji
382a2('bum): snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/
382a3('bum): de lta bas na/ khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi/
382a4('bum): de bas na/ khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la
382a5('bum): 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /le lo ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par
382a6('bum): smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/
382a7('bum): gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can sems
382b1('bum): g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /sems g.yeng ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal
382b2('bum): ba'am| byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/ de'i
382b3('bum): phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag
382b4('bum): la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /shes rab 'chal ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal bas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes
382b5('bum): rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam
382b6('bum): gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed
382b7('bum): pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la
383a1('bum): sbyor te| nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par
383a2('bum): zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos
383a3('bum): ston to| |rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams
383a4('bum): kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul
383a5('bum): gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong
383a6('bum): ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ rnam
383a7('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
383b1('bum): sam| rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa
383b2('bum): rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs
383b3('bum): rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can
383b4('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig / phongs pa ni/ sdug bsngal pa ste/ phongs pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos
383b5('bum): kyi| de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig / gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las
383b6('bum): mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston te/ sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /tshul khrims ngan pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba
383b7('bum): ste| tshul khrims ngan pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi
384a1('bum): skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/
384a2('bum): de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun gnod sems su
384a3('bum): gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par 'gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar
384a4('bum): mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i
384a5('bum): gnas yod kyi/ de bas na/ khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji
384a6('bum): snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /le lo ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i

384b1('bum): mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can
384b2('bum): sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /sems g.yeng ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can
384b3('bum): dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos
384b4('bum): kyi| de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyi sa 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa
384b5('bum): de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /shes rab 'chal ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal bas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci
384b6('bum): smos te| shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i
384b7('bum): sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod
385a1('bum): pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs
385a2('bum): pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed
385a3('bum): chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par
385a4('bum): zhen pa med do/ /zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas
385a5('bum): shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lca'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/
385a6('bum): de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/
385a7('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
385b1('bum): brgyad pa'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
385b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/

385b5('bum): ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig / phongs pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci

386a1('bum): bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal
386a2('bum): ba'am| byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/

386a5('bum): 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i
386a6('bum): gnas yod kyi/ de bas na/ khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji

386b3('bum): ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /sems g.yeng ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/

386b5('bum): khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di

387a1('bum): sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can

387a3('bum): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/
387a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur ba'i chos de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
387a5('bum): chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
387a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa
387a7('bum): de nyid kyis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson
387b1('bum): 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/

387b4('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa
387b5('bum): chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs
387b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin
387b7('bum): cing / phongs pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar
388a1('bum): gyis shig / gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos
388a2('bum): ston to| |sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag/ tshul khrims ngan pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas
388a3('bum): ni| bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/
388a4('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims
388a5('bum): ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la
388a6('bum): 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/
388a7('bum): khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi/ de bas
388b1('bum): na| khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du
388b2('bum): chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /le lo ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems
388b3('bum): can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta
388b4('bum): ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa
388b5('bum): de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /sems g.yeng ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye
388b6('bum): gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng
388b7('bum): ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos
389a1('bum): ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /shes rab 'chal ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal bas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta
389a2('bum): ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab
389a3('bum): 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la
389a4('bum): sbyor ro| |zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan
389a5('bum): par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du
389a6('bum): chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni/ mngon par zhen par mi nus
389a7('bum): te| stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
389b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lha'i mig gi rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
389b2('bum): khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa
389b3('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/
389b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/
389b5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin
389b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
389b7('bum): pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can
390a1('bum): de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig /phongs pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs
390a2('bum): pas ni| bdag gi dan kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
390a3('bum): phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la
390a4('bum): 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /tshul khrims ngan pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos
390a5('bum): te| gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung
390a6('bum): na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du
390a7('bum): gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed
390b1('bum): cig / sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol
390b2('bum): song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi/ de bas na/ khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur
390b3('bum): ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /le lo ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi
390b4('bum): nus na| gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum
390b5('bum): du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta
390b6('bum): re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /sems g.yeng ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam
390b7('bum): par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan
391a1('bum): gdon par lta ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yang ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems
391a2('bum): can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /shes rab 'chal ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal bas ni/ bdag gi don
391a3('bum): kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smon pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
391a4('bum): yin te| de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang
391a5('bum): ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyad pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
391a6('bum): la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de
391a7('bum): dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur ba'i chos de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni/ mngon par zhen
391b1('bum): par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
391b2('bum): pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya go brgyad
391b3('bum): pa| de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyi song zhing sbyin pa'am/ tshul
391b4('bum): khrims sam/ /bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
391b5('bum): rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
391b6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/
391b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par
392a1('bum): rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
392a2('bum): sam| byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa
392a3('bum): de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig / phongs pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni/ bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi/ de ltar
392a4('bum): khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig / gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar
392a5('bum): par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ /kye skyes bu dag /tshul khrims ngan pa ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/

392a7('bum): skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis
392b1('bum): tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag
392b2('bum): la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/
392b3('bum): khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi/ de bas na/
392b4('bum): khyod kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos

392b6('bum): ba'am| byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi/

393a1('bum): skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag /sems g.yeng ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol

393a3('bum): khyod kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la

393a5('bum): gang shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa de ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal
393a6('bum): ba'i sems can tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni/ mi sdug pa'i sbyor ro/ /
393a7('bum): zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni/ byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par
393b1('bum): zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag ni/ yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston
393b2('bum): te| khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni/ mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par
393b3('bum): zhen pa med do/ /zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas
393b4('bum): shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams la ma gnas par sems can rnams la chos
393b5('bum): bstan par mi nus te/ lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzud par mi nus so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bya 'dab ma med pas ni/ nam mkha' la 'gro
393b6('bum): bar mi nus so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma brten par sems can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus so/ /
393b7('bum): rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par
394a1('bum): shes pa mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don ci bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do/ /des lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
394a2('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems
394a3('bum): can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/ bzod pa'i gtam mam/ brtson 'grus kyi

394a5('bum): gi lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul
394a6('bum): gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis 'khor du chud par byas nas de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/ bzod pa'i gtam
394a7('bum): mam| brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/ bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/ shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /

394b7('bum): gis byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang
395a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims kyi

395a4('bum): cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas de dang mthun par sbyin
395a5('bum): pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/ bzod pa'i gtam mam/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/ bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/ shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i
395a6('bum): bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /des lha'i mig gis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag
395a7('bum): tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas
395b1('bum): nas de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/ bzod pa'i gtam mam/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/ bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/ shes rab kyi gtam

395b3('bum): ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gis sems sems
