402b2('bum): nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
402b3('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /
402b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du
402b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/
402b6('bum): lam gyi yan lag dge bar chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / mtha' las 'das
402b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don
403a1('bum): du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las
403a2('bum): sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed ba nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod
403a3('bum): kyang de la mi rtog cing / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma
403a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang
403a5('bum): gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos dor ba med
403a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
403a7('bum): bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol
403b1('bum): zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /
403b2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du rang bzhin stong
403b3('bum): pa nyid bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge
403b4('bum): ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis
403b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po
403b6('bum): de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po
403b7('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di
404a1('bum): ni| rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /
404a2('bum): zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i
404a3('bum): chos so| |sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid
404a4('bum): kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /zhes
404a5('bum): gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /
404a6('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa
404a7('bum): nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po
404b1('bum): de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po
404b2('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong
404b3('bum): pa nyid do/ /bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag
404b4('bum): kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
404b5('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bdag
404b6('bum): gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtag ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
404b7('bum): pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems
405a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo
405a2('bum): nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
405a3('bum): rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag
405a4('bum): dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /
405a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /
405a6('bum): 'di'i don du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ yang dag par spong ba gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol
405a7('bum): ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
405b1('bum): la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
405b2('bum): bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan
405b3('bum): yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dbang po lnga la spyod
405b4('bum): kyang de la mi rtog cing dbang po lnga bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ dbang po rnams so/ /bdag gis dbang po rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du dbang po rnams
405b5('bum): bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ dbang po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /
405b6('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos stobs lnga la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / stobs rnams sgom pa'i tshe ngo bo
405b7('bum): nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ stobs rnams so/ /bdag gis stobs rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du stobs rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ stobs gang
406a1('bum): gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
406a2('bum): ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid
406a3('bum): kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
406a4('bum): bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge
406a5('bum): ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /
406a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan
406a7('bum): lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
406b1('bum): pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems
406b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir
406b3('bum): 'di dag ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum
406b4('bum): po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dag pa'i chos so/ /sems dang
406b5('bum): po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos bsam gtan bzhi la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo
406b6('bum): nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ bsam gtan rnams so/ /bdag gis bsam gtan rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du bsam gtan rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po
406b7('bum): de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ bsam gtan gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas
407a1('bum): nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos tshad med pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis
407a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ tshad med pa rnams so/ /bdag gis tshad med pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du tshad med pa rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa
407a3('bum): ste| tshad med pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang
407a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom
407a5('bum): pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /bdag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par
407a6('bum): bya'o| |'di'i don du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la ma rtog pa ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang
407a7('bum): 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
407b1('bum): po'i dge ba'i chos rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /bdag
407b2('bum): gis rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad gang gis bdag kyang 'khor
407b3('bum): ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
407b4('bum): ba'i chos mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi
407b5('bum): phyir 'di dag ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /bdag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du mthar gyis
407b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol
407b7('bum): zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rnam
408a1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
408a2('bum): dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /bdag gis rnam par
408a3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
408a4('bum): bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
408a5('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mngon
408a6('bum): par shes pa rnams la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /bdag gis
408a7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ mngon par shes pa gang gis bdag kyang
408b1('bum): 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
408b2('bum): dge ba'i chos ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /bdag gis ting nge
408b3('bum): 'dzin rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan
408b4('bum): yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzungs kyi sgo rnams
408b5('bum): la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par
408b6('bum): bya'o| |'di'i don du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ gzungs kyi sgo gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/
408b7('bum): lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la
409a1('bum): spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
409a2('bum): rnams so/ /bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa
409a3('bum): ste| de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa
409a4('bum): nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod kyang de dag la mi rtog cing / mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe ngo
409a5('bum): bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /bdag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes
409a6('bum): gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po
409a7('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / so so yang dag par
409b1('bum): rig pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don
409b2('bum): du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba
409b3('bum): 'di ni| lam gyi yan lag dag pa'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos byams pa chen po la spyod kyang de
409b4('bum): la mi rtog cing / byams pa chen po bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ byams pa chen po'o/ /bdag gis byams pa chen po bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du byams pa chen
409b5('bum): po bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ byams pa chen po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos
409b6('bum): so| |sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos snying rje chen po la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / snying rje chen po bsgom pa'i tshe
409b7('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni/ snying rje chen po'o/ /bdag gis snying rje chen po bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du snying rje chen po bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/
410a1('bum): snying rje chen po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye
410a2('bum): bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
410a3('bum): brgyad sgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /
410a4('bum): 'di'i don du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
410a5('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ dge ba'i chos de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par
410a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/ lam des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can tshad med pa de dag 'khor
410a7('bum): ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal bar gyur pa dang / brgal ba dang / rgal bar 'gyur ba ste/ lam de yongs su rdzogs par byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
410b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can rnams kyi don
410b2('bum): byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug cu brgyad pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
410b3('bum): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos lags na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
410b4('bum): 'byor| gang 'di skad du gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang chos de dag nyid
410b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar zad de/ de rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spong ngo / /de la
410b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ chos thams cad
410b7('bum): skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
411a1('bum): po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyad par de yod do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zhugs pa'ang gzhan
411a2('bum): la| 'bras bu la gnas pa'ang gzhan te/ de gnyis ka'ang 'phags pa'i gang zag ma yin zhes mi bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/
411a3('bum): bar chad med pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa
411a4('bum): ste| rab 'byor/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro/ /rab 'byor
411a5('bum): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dag la 'di ni/ sems can
411a6('bum): dmyal ba pa'o/ /'di ni/ byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/ /'di ni/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/ /'di ni/ lha'o/ /'di ni/ mi'o/ /'di ni/ rigs kyi sa'o/ /'di ni/ brgyad pa'o/ /
411a7('bum): 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ dgra bcom pa'o/ /'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems
411b1('bum): dpa'o/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya bar khyad par dang / rnam par dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji
411b2('bum): ltar gang zag de dag dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang dmigs su ma mchis/ las ji ltar dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang dmigs su ma
411b3('bum): mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la las dang / las
411b4('bum): kyi rnam par smin pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad de ltar ma shes pa de dag ni/ ngan par spyod pa'am/ legs par spyad pa'am/
411b5('bum): mi g.yo ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ de dag ngan par spyad pa'i las kyis ngan sang gsum du lhung ngo / /legs par spyad pa'i las kyis lha dang / mir skye'o/ /nyams pa med pa'i las
411b6('bum): kyis gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs med pa'i khams su skye'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
411b7('bum): phyin pa la spyad/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/
412a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyad/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ tshan po stong pa nyid la spyad/ don dam pa stong
412a2('bum): pa nyid la spyad/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad/
412a3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la
412a4('bum): spyad| dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyad/ yang dag
412a5('bum): par spong ba rnams la spyad/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad/ dbang po rnams la spyad/ stobs rnams la spyad/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad/ 'phags pa'i lam
412a6('bum): yan lag brgyad pa la spyad/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad/ bsam gtan rnams la spyad/ tshad med pa rnams la spyad/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
412a7('bum): la spyad| rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
412b1('bum): pa med pa la spyad/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad/ mi 'jigs pa
412b2('bum): rnams la spyad/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad/ byams pa chen po la spyad/ snying rje chen po la spyad/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad de/ nyams pa med
412b3('bum): p a'i spyod pas byang chub kyi lam bskyed nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'khor dang ldan pa la mnyam par bzhag cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
412b4('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chud mi za shing rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar
412b5('bum): mi lhung bar de ltar don byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
412b6('bum): par sangs rgyas nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba gzigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ de bzhin
412b7('bum): gshegs pas chos nag po'am/ dkar po'am/ nag pa dang dkar ba'am/ mi nag mi dkar ba dmigs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma yin no/ /gsol pa/
413a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ de ste ma dmigs na/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/
413a2('bum): lha dang mir ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ rgyun du zhugs par ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ lan gcig phyir 'ong bar ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ phyir mi 'ong bar ji ltar gdags pa
413a3('bum): mdzad| dgra bcom par ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ byang chub sems par ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
413a4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ci sems can 'di dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan
413a5('bum): nyid kyis stong par shes sam/ gsol pa/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te sems can de dag 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan
413a6('bum): nyid kyis stong ngo / /zhes bya bar shes na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag
413a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs na/ sems can rnams kyang ngan song gsum dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams nas mi 'grol te/ rab 'byor/ sems can de dag chos
413b1('bum): rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi shes pas/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sangs rgyas bcom
413b2('bum): ldan 'das de dag las chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par thos nas sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ chos 'di dag
413b3('bum): ni| ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par chags par bya ba de ltar yod pa ma yin na/ de dag ni/ med cing yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yod par brtags shing /
413b4('bum): sems can med pa la sems can du 'du shes/ gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tshor ba med pa la tshor bar 'du shes/ 'du shes med pa la 'du shes su 'du shes/ 'du
413b5('bum): byed med pa la 'du byed du 'du shes/ rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/ mig med pa la mig tu 'du shes/ rna ba med pa la rna bar 'du shes/ sna med pa la
413b6('bum): snar 'du shes/ lce med pa la lcer 'du shes/ lus med pa la lus su 'du shes/ yid med pa la yid du 'du shes/ gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ sgra med pa la sgrar
413b7('bum): 'du shes/ dri med pa la drir 'du shes/ ro med pa la ror 'du shes/ reg med pa la reg tu 'du shes/ chos med pa la chos su 'du shes/ mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa la mig
414a1('bum): gi rnam par shes par 'du shes/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa la sna'i rnam
414a2('bum): par shes par 'du shes/ lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa la lce'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa la lus kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes/
414a3('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa la yid kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa la mig gi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa
414a4('bum): la rna ba'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa la sna'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa la lce'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ lus
414a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
414a6('bum): tshor ba med pa la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du
414a7('bum): shes/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la lce'i 'dus te
414b1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
414b2('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/ sa'i khams med pa la sa'i khams su 'du shes/ chu'i khams med pa la chu'i khams su 'du
414b3('bum): shes| me'i khams med pa la me'i khams su 'du shes/ rlung gi khams med pa la rlung gi khams su 'du shes/ nam mkha'i khams med pa la nam mkha'i khams su 'du shes/
414b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa la rnam par shes pa'i khams su 'du shes/ ma rig pa med pa la ma rig par 'du shes/ 'du byed med pa la 'du byed du 'du shes/ rnam par shes
414b5('bum): pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/ ming dang gzugs med pa la ming dang gzugs su 'du shes/ skye mched drug med pa la skye mched drug tu 'du shes/ reg pa med pa la reg
414b6('bum): par 'du shes/ tshor ba med pa la tshor bar 'du shes/ sred pa med pa la sred par 'du shes/ len pa med pa la len par 'du shes/ srid pa med pa la srid par 'du shes/ skye ba med pa
414b7('bum): la skye bar 'du shes/ rga shi med pa la rga shir 'du shes/ 'jig rten pa'i chos med pa la 'jig rten pa'i chos su 'du shes/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos med pa la 'jig rten
415a1('bum): las 'das pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos med pa la/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag pa med pa'i chos med pa la zag pa med
415a2('bum): pa'i chos su 'du shes/ 'dus byas kyi chos med pa la 'dus byas kyi chos su 'du shes/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos med pa la 'dus ma byas kyi chos su 'du shes nas yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci
415a3('bum): log gis phyin ci log tu gyur ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed pa de dag rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi
415a4('bum): ' grol ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par byas te byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing bla na med
415a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grol to// //
415a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya go dgu pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ ji
415a7('bum): l tar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams
415b1('bum): yongs su 'grol ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
415b2('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam sems can rnams
415b3('bum): la ston to/ /'chad do/ /'jog go /'god do/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'grel to/ /gsal bar byed do/ /yang dag par brjod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhin po 'dir dge ba'i chos byang
415b4('bum): chub kyi phyogs gang ji snyed pa gang gis dkon mchog gsum rnam par 'god pa de thams cad yongs su 'dus te/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun
415b5('bum): dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du byung bas/ sems can rnams lam rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su 'grol to/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sdug bsngal
415b6('bum): 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te sdug bsngal gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur
415b7('bum): ram| 'on te kun 'byung bas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te sdug bsngal 'gog pas mya
416a1('bum): ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ lam 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te lam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bcom
416a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no/ /kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya
416a3('bum): ngan las mi 'da' ste/ kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no/ /sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no/ /lam shes
416a4('bum): pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ lam gyis kyang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mya ngan las 'da' bar
416a5('bum): ngas gsungs te/ sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin no/ /sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no/ /kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma
416a6('bum): yin| kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no/ /sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no/ /lam shes pas yongs
416a7('bum): su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ lam gyis kyang ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis/ sdug bsngal 'tshal ba'ang ma mchis/ kun
416b1('bum): 'byung ba'ang ma mchis/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal ba'ang ma mchis/ 'gog pa'ang ma mchis/ 'gog pa 'tshal ba'ang ma mchis/ lam yang ma mchis/ lam 'tshal ba'ang ma mchis pa'i
416b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang /
416b3('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin la de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni/
416b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings chos kyi dbyings mi nyams mi 'grib par 'dug pa ste/ de'i
416b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bden pa khong du chud par ji ltar bya ba bzhin du bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod do/ /
416b6('bum): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/ bden pa rtogs pa'i don du spyod pa lags/
416b7('bum): ji ltar spyod na/ bden pa rtogs shing 'tshal te khong du chud nas nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa lags/ bcom
417a1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos de dag ci nas kyang
417a2('bum): chos gang yang dmigs su med pa de ltar mthong ste/ chos thams cad ma dmigs pas bden par rtogs pa'am/ bden par ma rtogs pa'i chos thams cad stong par mthong ste/ des
417a3('bum): de ltar mthong bas skyon med par chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rigs kyi sa la gnas par
417a4('bum): gyur nas spyi bor ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ de na nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i spyi bor ltung ba med do/ /de byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi sa de la gnas shing
417a5('bum): bsam gtan bzhi sgrub bo/ /tshad med pa bzhi sgrub bo/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub bo/ /de lhag mthong gis de la gnas shing / chos thams cad rab tu
417a6('bum): shes par byed de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par byed do/ /de sdug bsngal yongs su shes kyang sdug bsngal la dmigs pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /kun 'byung ba rab tu
417a7('bum): spangs kyang kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /'gog pa mngon du byed kyang 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /lam sgom yang lam la dmigs pa'i
417b1('bum): sems mi skyed do/ /gzhan du na byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du byed pa mthong bar byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos
417b2('bum): thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid do/ /gsol pa/ stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
417b3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/ rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis chos thams cad stong pa'o/ /zhes bya bar lta ste/ ngo bo nyid gang la gnas shing byang chub tu
417b4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid chos gang la'ang ngo bo nyid yod par mi mthong ngo / /dngos po med pa ni/ byang chub ste/ de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/ rang
417b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ dgra bcom pas ma byas/ phyir mi 'ong bas ma byas/ lan gcig phyir 'ong bas ma byas/ rgyun du zhugs pas ma byas/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma byas/
417b6('bum): gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma byas te/ gzhan du na yang dag pa ji lta ba de sems can rnams kyis mi shes mi mthong
417b7('bum): bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
418a1('bum): stong phrag brgya pa las/ /le'u drug cu dgu pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
418a2('bum): 'das| gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis te/ de dag sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dgra bcom pas kyang ma bgyis/ phyir mi 'ong
418a3('bum): bas kyang ma bgyis/ lan gcig phyir 'ong bas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyun du zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub
418a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma bgyis na/ chos de dag la 'di dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/ /'di dag ni/
418a5('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ lha'o/ /'di dag ni/ mi'o/ /las 'dis ni/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
418a6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ mir 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/
418a7('bum): mtshe ma'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ dga' ldan gyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ 'phrul dga'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar 'gyur
418b1('bum): ro| |las 'dis ni/ tshangs ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ tshangs
418b2('bum): chen gyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ snang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ chung snang gi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ tshad med snang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ kun snang
418b3('bum): dang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ dge ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ chung dge'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ tshad med dge ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ dge
418b4('bum): rgyas kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ chung che'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ tshad med che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ 'bras bu che
418b5('bum): ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ las 'dis ni/ mi che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ mi gdung ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/
418b6('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ 'og min gyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ nam mkha' yas skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ rnam shes mtha'
418b7('bum): yas skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las
419a1('bum): 'dis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
419a2('bum): bur 'gyur ro/ /las 'di ni/ dgra bcom par 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro/ /
419a3('bum): las 'dis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /zhes bgyi bar tha dad du dbye ba'am/ rnam par dgod par yang ji ltar 'gyur/
419a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po ma mchis pa la ni/ bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis te/ bgyi ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba'am/
419a5('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba'am/ mir skye ba'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba'am/ dga' ldan
419a6('bum): gyi lhar skye ba'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs pa kun
419a7('bum): 'khor gyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba'am/ tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye
419b1('bum): ba'am| dge ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba'am/ tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba'am/ tshad
419b2('bum): med che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ mi che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ mi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye
419b3('bum): ba'am| 'og min gyi lhar skye ba'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar
419b4('bum): skye ba'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur
419b5('bum): ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'am/ rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
419b6('bum): chen po'i lam la spyod par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'am/ thob par gyur nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar 'gyur
419b7('bum): ro| |zhes bya ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin
420a1('bum): no| |de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa la ni/ las kyang med/ bya ba'ang med/ 'bras bu'ang med na/ 'on kyang byis pa so
420a2('bum): so'i skye bo 'phags pa'i chos la mi mkhas pa rnams kyis chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mi shes te/ phyin ci log las byung ba'i sems kyis las sna tshogs mngon par
420a3('bum): 'du byed pas de dag gi lus rnam pa de bzhin du mngon par 'grub ste/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ mi'am/ rgyal
420a4('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'am/ mtshe ma'i lha'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'am/ tshangs ris
420a5('bum): kyi lha'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'am/ tshangs chen gyi lha'am/ snang ba'i lha'am/ chung snang gi lha'am/ tshad med snang ba'i lha'am/ kun snang
420a6('bum): dang ba'i lha'am/ dge ba'i lha'am/ chung dge'i lha'am/ tshad med dge ba'i lha'am/ dge rgyas kyi lha'am/ che ba'i lha'am/ chung che'i lha'am/ tshad med che ba'i lha'am/ 'bras bu che
420a7('bum): ba'i lha'am/ mi che ba'i lha'am/ mi gdung ba'i lha'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lha'am/ 'og min gyi lha'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi
420b1('bum): lha'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lus mngon par 'grub ste/
420b2('bum): dngos po med pa la ni/ las sam/ bya ba'am/ 'bras bu med de/ dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ de la 'di skad du dngos po med pa la ni/
420b3('bum): bya ba gang yang med de/ bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/ mir skye ba'am/ rgyal
420b4('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba'am/ dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba'am/ gzhan 'phrul
420b5('bum): dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba'am/ snang ba'i
420b6('bum): lhar skye ba'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba'am/ tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba'am/ tshad
420b7('bum): med dge ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba'am/ tshad med che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/
421a1('bum): mi che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ mi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ 'og min gyi lhar skye ba'am/
421a2('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes
421a3('bum): med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
421a4('bum): 'gyur ba'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'am/ rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod pa'am/ rnam pa
421a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'am/ de thob nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bya ba gang yang med do/ /zhes zer ba ni/
421a6('bum): rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ lam dngos po med pa ma yin nam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po med pa ma yin nam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos
421a7('bum): po med pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po med pa ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po med pa ma yin nam/ rang byang chub dngos po med pa ma yin nam/
421b1('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po med pa ma yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po med pa ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lam ni/ dngos po ma mchis
421b2('bum): pa'o| |rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/ dngos po ma mchis
421b3('bum): pa'o| |dgra bcom pa nyid ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /rang byang chub ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
421b4('bum): pa nyid ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ dngos po med pa'i chos shes shig dngos po med pa'i chos thob par byed snyam
421b5('bum): mam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na dngos po med pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa'i
421b6('bum): chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa ste/ 'di ltar
421b7('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can phyin ci log
422a1('bum): bzhis phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa mi rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ sdug bsngal ba la bde ba'i 'dus shes su gyur pa/ bdag med pa la bdag
422a2('bum): gi 'du shes su gyur pa/ mi sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ dngos po la mngon par zhen pa rnams dngos po las rnam par 'grel to/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
422a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la dngos po zhen pa'o/ /zhes nas mngon par zhen par rgyur pa de lta bu'i dngos po de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin
422a4('bum): zhes bgyi ba ma mchis sam/ de ste ma mchis na ni/ mngon par 'du bgyid par yang ji ltar 'gyur/ sug las des kyang shul rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba nas ci ste mi 'grol/ bcom
422a5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par gang la gnas te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams las mngon par 'du byed pa'i dngos po ni/ chung ngu
422a6('bum): na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bshags pa tsam yang med do/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ ci nas kyang don 'di gsal zhing rdzogs pa dang / mkhas pas shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la
422a7('bum): dpe bshad do/ /rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam du mthong ba la rmi lam mthong ba de gang la gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang
422b1('bum): yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rmi lam nyid kyang ma mchis na/ rmi lam mthong ba de la gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/
422b2('bum): ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa
422b3('bum): med pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la rmi lam dang 'dra ba ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las
422b4('bum): 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang rmi lam lta bu ma lags pa de lta bu ma mchis so/ /bcom
422b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci rmi lam la rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
422b6('bum): 'byor| de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam la lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa yod dam/
422b7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ brjod pa dang / tshig dang / sgra dang / yi ge thams cad kyis gdags su ma
423a1('bum): mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ me long la gzugs brnyan snang ba de la gang las mngon par 'du
423a2('bum): byed cing / mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/ mi dang lhar 'gyur
423a3('bum): ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ gzhan du na byis pa rnams la bslu ba ma gtogs par dngos
423a4('bum): po ma mchis pa ste/ gzugs brnyan nyid kyang ma mchis na/ gang mngon par 'du bgyid cing / mngon par 'du bgyis pas sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/ byol song gi skye
423a5('bum): gnas su mchi ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba'am/ mi dang lhar 'gyur ba'i sug las lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
423a6('bum): stsal pa| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ de la lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom
423a7('bum): pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs brnyan nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/ lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon
423b1('bum): mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
423b2('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ nags stug po dang / ri dang / gcong rong dang / lung pa nas sgra brnyan byung na/ sgra brnyan de las mngon par 'du byed cing / mngon par 'du byas pas/ sems can
423b3('bum): dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/ lha dang mir 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom
423b4('bum): ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ sgra brnyan de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/ de la gang sug las mngon par 'du bgyi zhing mngon par 'du bgyis na/ sems
423b5('bum): can dmyal bar mchis pa'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchis ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchis ba'am/ lha dang mir skye ba'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/
423b6('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba'am/ dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba'am/
423b7('bum): tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung
424a1('bum): snang gi lhar skye ba'am/ tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba'am/
424a2('bum): tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba'am/ tshad med che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/
424a3('bum): mi che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ mi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ 'og min gyi lhar skye ba'am/ nam mkha' mtha'
424a4('bum): yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
424a5('bum): mched kyi lhar skye ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan gyi lam gang la bsgoms
424a6('bum): pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags
424a7('bum): te| bcom ldan 'das/ sgra brnyan nyid kyang shin tu ma mchis pa lags na/ lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur
424b1('bum): ba'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ smig rgyu la chu med par chu'i 'du shes su gyur pa
424b2('bum): dang / chu klung med par chu klung gi 'du shes su gyur pa dang / grong khyer med pa la grong khyer gyi 'du shes su gyur pa dang / skyed mos tshal med par skye mos tshal gyi 'du shes su gyur pa de la
424b3('bum): 'du shes kyi lam gang mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/ mir skye ba'am/
424b4('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba'am/ dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba'am/ gzhan
424b5('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba'am/ snang
424b6('bum): ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba'am/ tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba'am/ tshad
424b7('bum): med dge ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba'am/ tshad med che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ mi che
425a1('bum): ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ mi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ 'og min gyi lhar skye
425a2('bum): ba'am| nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ 'du shes
425a3('bum): med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ smig rgyu la 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / mig gis log par
425a4('bum): mthong ba ma gtogs par chu klung dang / grong khyer dang / skyed mos tshal shin tu ma mchis na/ sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/
425a5('bum): byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba'am/ mir skye ba'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba'am/

425a7('bum): nye phan gyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba'am/ tshad med snang ba'i

425b4('bum): kyi lhar skye ba'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ ma mchis so/ /
425b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ phyin ci log gi 'du shes de la lam gang bsgoms bas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ rnam par
425b6('bum): byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log gi 'du shes de nyid kyang dngos
425b7('bum): po ma mchis pa lags na/ lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ ma
426a1('bum): mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma sna tshogs glang po'i tshogs sam/ rta'i
426a2('bum): tshogs sam/ glang gi tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs sam/ bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs mngon par sprul nas sum de la gang mngon par 'du byas
426a3('bum): pas| sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/ mir skye ba'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye

426a6('bum): chung snang gi lhar skye ba'am/ tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba'am/ tshad med dge ba'i
426a7('bum): lhar skye ba'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba'am/ tshad med che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ mi che ba'i

427a4('bum): min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba ni/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bshags pa tsam yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems
427a5('bum): sgyu ma la lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom
427a6('bum): ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos la nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das

428a2('bum): la lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/

428a4('bum): dam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam
428a5('bum): par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med pa de bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag dang bdag gir bya ba la gnas shing
428a6('bum): sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi/ yang dag pa mthong ba ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med do/ /ji ltar
428a7('bum): yang dag pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
428b1('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun cu pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa
428b2('bum): mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'ang ma mchis pa de bzhin du yang dag pa ma mthong ba la'ang kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang
428b3('bum): bar 'gyur ba ma mchis te/ de ni/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po ma mchis pa la ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang
428b4('bum): ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo bo nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la'ang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam
428b5('bum): par byang ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par byang bar gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa
428b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gnas rnam par byang bar gsungs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
428b7('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
429a1('bum): dag pa'i mtha' gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ de bzhin du gnas pa'i chos kyi gnas
429a2('bum): nyid dang / dbyings 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor/ rnam par byang ba ste/ de ni/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod kyi/ de ni/ brjod du med cing smos
429a3('bum): su med pa ste/ sgra dang / tshig thams cad kyi lam las 'das pa'i chos so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ mig
429a4('bum): yor lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu sprul pa lta bu lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / chos thams cad sgra
429a5('bum): brnyan lta bu dang / chos thams cad mig yor lta bu dang / chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bu dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu ste/ dngos po
429a6('bum): ma mchis pa/ rdzas ma mchis pa la bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bzod
429a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /
429b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /
429b2('bum): stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su
429b3('bum): rdzogs par bya'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /don dam pa
429b4('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
429b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs
429b6('bum): su rdzogs par bya'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su
429b7('bum): rdzogs par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
430a1('bum): par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs
430a2('bum): su rdzogs par bya'o/ /dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i
430a3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /tshad med pa
430a4('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mthar gyis
430a5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /
430a6('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
430a7('bum): pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /byams pa chen
430b1('bum): po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su
430b2('bum): rdzogs par bya'o/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'od chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi sems kyi
430b3('bum): rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes par bya ste/ dbyangs gcig gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /zhes bgyi bar bla na med pa
430b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de dag rmi lam
430b5('bum): lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos de dag rmi lam
430b6('bum): lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
430b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ rmi lam ni/ yang dag pa ma lags/ sgra brnyan ni/ yang dag pa ma lags/ mig yor ni/ yang dag pa ma lags/ smig rgyu
431a1('bum): ni| yang dag pa ma lags/ sgyu ma ni/ yang dag pa ma lags/ sprul pa ni/ yang dag pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa ma lags pas/ sbyin
431a2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /
431a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
431a4('bum): la spyad pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus
431a5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
431a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po
431a7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / yang
431b1('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi la spyad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / dbang po lnga la spyad pa dang / stobs lnga la spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyad pa dang /
431b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyad pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / gzugs
431b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyad pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo
431b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la spyad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyad pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la
431b5('bum): spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyad pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyad pa
431b6('bum): dang / snying rje chen po la spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
431b7('bum): mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ yang dag pa ma yin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
432a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
432a2('bum): spyad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / stong pa nyid stong
432a3('bum): pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /

438a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
438a2('bum): par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par
438a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /
438a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
438a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /
438a6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par
438a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /
438b1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
438b2('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /dngos po med
438b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
438b4('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag
438b5('bum): pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
438b6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /dbang po rnams bla na med pa
438b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /stobs rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /byang
439a1('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bla na
439a2('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par

439a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon

439b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dus byas pa mngon par 'dus byas pa ste/
439b7('bum): 'dus byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa'i chos kyis ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so/ /rab 'byor/ 'on kyang chos de dag ni/ thams cad kyang lam sgrub
440a1('bum): pa dang / lam bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ste/ 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir ni/ ma yin no/ /chos de dag gi mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung ba gang yin pa ni/ mtshan nyid med
440a2('bum): pa'ang de yin te/ de lta bas na/ byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul
440a3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
440a4('bum): pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong

440a6('bum): pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

440b1('bum): sam| stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan
440b2('bum): rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
440b3('bum): rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
440b4('bum): sam| de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas
440b5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
440b6('bum): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa

441a6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i

441b1('bum): po de dag yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya bar mi nus pas/ de'i phyir de lta bas na/
441b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bur
