444b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang /
444b2('bum): sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang /
444b3('bum): sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta
444b4('bum): bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
444b5('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha
444b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes
444b7('bum): so| |de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang /
445a1('bum): sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang /
445a2('bum): smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan
445a3('bum): lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mi 'jigs pa rnams rmi lam lta
445a4('bum): bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe so so yang
445a5('bum): dag par rig pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
445a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byams pa chen po rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de
445a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur
445b1('bum): shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang /
445b2('bum): sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thams cad shes pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig
445b3('bum): rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig
445b4('bum): yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes
445b5('bum): so| |sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /sems can de dag thams cad kyang rmi'am la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar
445b6('bum): shes so| |sgra brnyan la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar shes so/ /mig yor la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar shes so/ /smig rgyu la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar shes so/ /sgyu ma la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar shes so/ /
445b7('bum): sprul pa la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar shes so/ /de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med
446a1('bum): par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sgra brnyan lta bu'i chos rnams
446a2('bum): dngos po med par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mig yor lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po
446a3('bum): med par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe smig rgyu lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin
446a4('bum): te| de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung
446a5('bum): zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa
446a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
446a7('bum): phyin pa'ang gzung du med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do/ /
446b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang
446b2('bum): gzung du med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong
446b3('bum): pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /
446b4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang
446b5('bum): gzung du med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /yang
446b6('bum): dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /dbang po rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /stobs rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /byang chub kyi
446b7('bum): yan lag rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzung du med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang
447a1('bum): gzung du med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams
447a2('bum): kyang gzung du med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang
447a3('bum): gzung du med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /de bzhin gshegs
447a4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /byams pa chen po'ang gzung du
447a5('bum): med do/ /snying rje chen po'ang gzung du med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzung du med do/ /de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad
447a6('bum): gzung du med par shes par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ gzung du med cing dngos
447a7('bum): po med pa ste/ rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ mig yor lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu ste/ sems can rnams kyi chos de dag ma shes ma mthong ba ma
447b1('bum): gtogs par gzung du med pa'i chos kyis gzung du med pa'i chos gang yang thob par mi nus pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi don
447b2('bum): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang sems can thams cad kyi don du
447b3('bum): gtong ngo / /tshul khrims gang ci srung yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsrung ngo / /bzod pa gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom yang
447b4('bum): sems can thams cad kyi don du rtsom mo/ /bsam gtan gang ci la mnyam par gzhog kyang sems can thams cad kyi don du mnyam par gzhog go /shes rab gang ci sgom yang sems
447b5('bum): can thams cad kyi don du bsgom ste/ bdag gi don du ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
447b6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can gang sems can med pa la sems can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag
447b7('bum): gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / srog med pa la srog gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / 'gro ba med pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gso ba med pa la gso ba'i 'du shes su
448a1('bum): gnas pa dang / skyes bu med pa la skyes bu'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gang zag med pa la gang zag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed can med pa la shed
448a2('bum): can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed bdag med pa la shed bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed pa po med pa la byed pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed du 'jug pa
448a3('bum): po med pa la byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / slong ba po med pa la slong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / slong du 'jug pa po med pa la slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du
448a4('bum): shes su gnas pa dang / tshor ba po med pa la tshor ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / tshor du 'jug pa po med pa la tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shes pa
448a5('bum): po med pa la shes pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / mthong ba po med pa la mthong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa de dag phyin ci log las rnam par 'grel te/ phyin ci log las
448a6('bum): rnam par bkrol zhing 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su 'god do/ /de la bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag yongs su mi rgyu ste/ bdag gi 'du shes sam/ sems can gyi 'du shes sam/ srog
448a7('bum): gi 'du shes sam/ 'gro ba'i 'du shes sam/ gso ba'i 'du shes sam/ skyes bu'i 'du shes sam/ gang zag gi 'du shes sam/ shed can gyi 'du shes sam/ shed bdag gi
448b1('bum): 'du shes sam/ byed pa po'i 'du shes sam/ byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ slong ba po'i 'du shes sam/ slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes sam/
448b2('bum): tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ shes pa po'i 'du shes sam/ mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su mi rgyu ste/ de g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / 'dor ba dang / spros pa 'di
448b3('bum): dag btang nas spros pa med pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs shing mang du spyod de/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
448b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bdag nyid kyang chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med la/ sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa la rab tu 'god de/ de ni/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad
448b5('bum): du yin gyi don dam par ni/ ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du mngon
448b6('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam/ ma lags kyi/ don dam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di
448b7('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod pa ste/ de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya ba de
449a1('bum): lta bu gang yang mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dmigs pa ste/
449a2('bum): gnyis kyis ni/ gang yang thob pa'am/ mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis
449a3('bum): na| gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis kyis kyang thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba
449a4('bum): med de| gnyis su med pas kyang thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do/ /gang la gnyis kyang med la/ mi gnyis pa'ang med pa ni/ thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa zhes
449a5('bum): bya'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni/ thob pa'o/ /'di ni/ mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ spros pa ste/ chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa med de/ spros pa med pa ni/ chos
449a6('bum): mnyam pa nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la/ chos kyi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'ang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
449a7('bum): stsal pa| gang la dngos po med pa dang / dngos po med pa la'ang ma yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / yongs su brjod pa med pa 'di ni/ chos mnyam pa nyid de/ chos mnyam pa nyid po
449b1('bum): de ni| brjod du med pa'o/ /chos mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs par yang dmigs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med de/ chos mnyam pa nyid ni/ chos thams cad las rnam par 'das pa'o/ /chos
449b2('bum): mnyam pa nyid ni/ byis pa'am/ 'phags pa'am/ chos gang gis kyang shes par mi rung zhing / yul ma yin pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos mnyam pa nyid po de ni/ de bzhin
449b3('bum): gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos mnyam pa nyid ni/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'am/
449b4('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ rang byang chub bam/ byang chub sems dpa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom
449b5('bum): ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur ba ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
449b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin na ni/ de
449b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur bar yang 'gyur na/ rab 'byor/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid
450a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba
450a2('bum): rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub
450a3('bum): sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid dang
450a4('bum): mi mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang med do/ /de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mnyam pa
450a5('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni/ so so'i skye bo'o/ /'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ dgra
450a6('bum): bcom pa'o/ /'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'o/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya bar
450a7('bum): gnyis su bya ba med de/ rnam par rtog pa de dag ni/ mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'di ni/ so so'i skye
450b1('bum): bo'o/ /'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ dgra bcom pa'o/ /'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'o/ /
450b2('bum): 'di ni| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag mi dmigs na/ des so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs
450b3('bum): pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
450b4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ chos
450b5('bum): thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs
450b6('bum): rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ste
450b7('bum): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
451a1('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i
451a2('bum): slad du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
451a3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid
451a4('bum): kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon
451a5('bum): mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan pa ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / chos dkon
451a6('bum): mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags/ gzugs ma
451a7('bum): mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ thogs pa ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o/ /de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni/ so so'i skye
451b1('bum): bo'o| |'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni/ dgra bcom pa'o/ /'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'o/ /'di ni/ de
451b2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes rnam par dgod par bgyi ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
451b3('bum): 'byor| de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ de ste de bzhin gshegs pa
451b4('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir chos rnams rnam par dgod par ma mdzad na/ sems
451b5('bum): can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam/ byol song gi skye gnas yod par mngon nam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod par mngon nam/ mi yod par mngon nam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/
451b6('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ mtshe ma'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dga' ldan gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ 'phrul dga'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod par
451b7('bum): mngon nam/ tshangs ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs chen gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ snang ba'i lha
452a1('bum): yod par mngon nam/ chung snang gi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad med snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/
452a2('bum): chung dge'i lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad med dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dge rgyas kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung che'i lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad med che ba'i lha
452a3('bum): yod par mngon nam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ mi che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ mi gdung ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gya nom snang ba'i
452a4('bum): lha yod par mngon nam/ 'og min gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ cung zad med
452a5('bum): pa'i skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
452a6('bum): phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon
452a7('bum): nam| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam/ nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyi stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyi nang
452b1('bum): stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ chen po stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod par
452b2('bum): mngon nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dor ba med pa stong
452b3('bum): pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ mi dmigs
452b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/
452b5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yod par mngon nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ dbang po rnams yod par mngon nam/
452b6('bum): stobs rnams yod par mngon nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod par
452b7('bum): mngon nam/ bsam gtan rnams yod par mngon nam/ tshad med pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam par thar pa rnams yod
453a1('bum): par mngon nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod par mngon
453a2('bum): nam| mngon par shes pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod par
453a3('bum): mngon nam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ byams pa chen po yod par mngon nam/ snying rje chen po yod par mngon nam/
453a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod par mngon nam/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas dkon
453a5('bum): mchog yod par mngon nam/ chos dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
453a6('bum): yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yod par
453a7('bum): mngon nam/ brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mngon nam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ dgra bcom pa
453b1('bum): yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa' yod par mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par
453b2('bum): mngon nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos de dag thams cad ni/ mchis par mngon par mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ de ltar
453b3('bum): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ chos rnams rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
453b4('bum): brgya pa/ /bam po sum brgya gcig pa/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba de bzhin du so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid
453b5('bum): las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos
453b6('bum): mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du brgyad pa'ang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi
453b7('bum): g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo
454a1('bum): ba lags sam/ de bzhin du dgra bcom pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang chos mnyam pa
454a2('bum): nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
454a3('bum): de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo'o/ /chos mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di
454a4('bum): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid
454a5('bum): dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de nyid ni/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de
454a6('bum): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de nyid ni/ dad
454a7('bum): pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /
454b1('bum): chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid

454b4('bum): nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /

454b6('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid

455a1('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni/ rang
455a2('bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med
455a3('bum): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
455a4('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag thams cad ni/ chos mnyam pa nyid de las rnam par mi 'da'o/ /de
455a5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
455a6('bum): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni/ de nyid yin te/ de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang med do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar so so'i
455a7('bum): skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa nyid/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid
455b1('bum): brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos

455b4('bum): 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang /
455b5('bum): dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus
455b6('bum): te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes
455b7('bum): pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
456a1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
456a2('bum): dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / 'dod chags dang /
456a3('bum): zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / lte ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
456a4('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
456a5('bum): phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
456a6('bum): sa bcu dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
456a7('bum): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
456b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
456b2('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa
456b3('bum): nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
456b4('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
456b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
456b6('bum): brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams te/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos de dag ni/
456b7('bum): kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu mi 'dra ba/ gcig las gcig 'das pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la/ tshor ba'i chos
457a1('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan te/ mig gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
457a2('bum): rna ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
457a3('bum): sgra'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dri'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ro'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang
457a4('bum): gzhan| rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
457a5('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te
457a6('bum): reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mig gi
457a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang
457b1('bum): gzhan| lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
457b2('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ me'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nam mkha'i
457b3('bum): khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang
457b4('bum): gzhan| ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sred pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/
457b5('bum): len pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ srid pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rga shi'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang
457b6('bum): gzhan| gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/
457b7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
458a1('bum): phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
458a2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang
458a3('bum): gzhan| 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
458a4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
458a5('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos
458a6('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
458a7('bum): rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags
458b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid
458b2('bum): kyang gzhan/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
458b3('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin
458b4('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
458b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byams pa chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid
458b6('bum): kyang gzhan/ mi chen po'i mtshan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dpe byad bzang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams
458b7('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags/ chos rnam par dgod par ni/ ji ltar 'gyur/
459a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags/ chos
459a2('bum): rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
459a3('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags/ ji ltar skyon med par zhugs nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
459a4('bum): sa las 'das te mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /
459a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
459a6('bum): par bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / de dag la rnam par brtse
459a7('bum): bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags/ de dag tu'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lags/
459b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gang 'di
459b2('bum): skad du| de ste chos thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de
459b3('bum): nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan gcig
459b4('bum): phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos
459b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
459b6('bum): kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/ mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin
459b7('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid
460a1('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mig gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
460a2('bum): pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
460a3('bum): ma yin nam/ lus kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
460a4('bum): pa nyid ma yin nam/ sgra'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dri'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ro'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
460a5('bum): ma yin nam/ reg gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin
460a6('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa
460a7('bum): nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
460b1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang
460b2('bum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi
460b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
460b4('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
460b5('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
460b6('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
460b7('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ me'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid
461a1('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang
461a2('bum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ma rig pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes
461a3('bum): pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa
461a4('bum): nyid ma yin nam/ reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sred pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
461a5('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ len pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ srid pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de
461a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rga shi'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshul khrims
461a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
461b1('bum): phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid
461b2('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin bde nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi nang
461b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
461b4('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'dus ma
461b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
461b6('bum): nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
461b7('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
462a1('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
462a2('bum): nam| ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dran pa
462a3('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
462a4('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
462a5('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
462a6('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshad
462a7('bum): med pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par
462b1('bum): thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i
462b2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
462b3('bum): nam| ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
462b4('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang
462b5('bum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa
462b6('bum): nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun du zhugs ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir
462b7('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang
463a1('bum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
463a2('bum): kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de
463a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang sangs
463a4('bum): rgyas kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin
463a5('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/
463a6('bum): tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i
463a7('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ sgra'i mtshan nyid dam/ dri'i mtshan nyid dam/ ro'i
463b1('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ reg gi mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid
463b2('bum): dam| lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te
463b3('bum): reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mig
463b4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg
463b5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid
463b6('bum): dam| chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid
463b7('bum): dam| ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid dam/ reg pa'i
464a1('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sred pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ len pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ srid pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ skye ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rga shi'i
464a2('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
464a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid
464a4('bum): kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/
464a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi
464a6('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
464a7('bum): nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
464b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dbang po
464b2('bum): rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stobs rnams kyi mchan nyid dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i bden
464b3('bum): pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par
464b4('bum): thar pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
464b5('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi
464b6('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid dam/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs
464b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan gcig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan
465a1('bum): nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
465a2('bum): nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa'i 'das nyid dam/ rang sangs
465a3('bum): rgyas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs
465a4('bum): sam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ chos thams
465a5('bum): cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la'ang so so'i skye bo med/ so so'i skye bo las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba med/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med/
465a6('bum): de la'ang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba med/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang brgyad pa med/ brgyad pa las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang rgyun du zhugs pa med/ rgyun

465b1('bum): na'ang de med/ de la'ang dgra bcom pa med/ dgra bcom pa las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang rang sangs rgyas med/ rang sangs rgyas las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' med/

471a7('bum): pa'o| |gsol pa/ de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ chos de ni/ ma sprul pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
471b1('bum): 'di skad du/ stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ gnyis su'ang mi dmigs te/ chos gang yang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu med do/ /zhes bka' stsal pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi mnyam
471b2('bum): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'ang sprul par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ stong pa ste/ de dag
471b3('bum): ni| nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
471b4('bum): kyis ma mdzad de/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid
471b5('bum): yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi na/ ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ci sngon dngos po yod par gyur la/ phyis dngos po med par
471b6('bum): 'gyur ba yod dam/ rab 'byor/ 'di la dngos po yong pa'ang med/ dngos po med pa'ang med/ ngo bo nyid kyang med/ gzhan gyi dngos po'ang med na/ de la gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid
471b7('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par 'gyur re skan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
472a1('bum): brgya pa/ bam po sum brgya gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
472a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'tshal bas/ gzugs la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du
472a3('bum): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye
472a4('bum): mched dang / yid kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / chos kyi
472a5('bum): skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par

472b1('bum): bslab par bgyi/ mig gi reg pa'i skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi reg pa'i skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ma rig pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ 'du
472b2('bum): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la ji ltar
472b3('bum): bslab par bgyi/ sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs can
472b4('bum): gyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs can ma lags pa dang / bstan du mchis pa dang / bstan du ma mchis pa dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa dang /

473b3('bum): 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di dngos po dang bcas par dmigs/ 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming

478a1('bum): 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ dbyings 'di ni/ don dam par na brjod du ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te brjod du ma mchis

478a4('bum): 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/ gal te don dam par ma mchis na ni/ 'o na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings su'ang ji ltar 'gyur te/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po ni/ brjod du ma mchis
478a5('bum): pa'i dbyings zhes bgyir mi rung lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i/
478a6('bum): ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa de'i tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan
478a7('bum): ma'i dngos po gang la 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs
478b1('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa 'di khyod kyis dmigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi dmigs lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ byams
478b2('bum): pa| rnam grangs 'dis 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang yin pa de brjod du med pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin la/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan
478b3('bum): pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
478b4('bum): zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la gal te brjod du med pa'i dbyings yin du zin na/ 'o na ni/ byis pa so so'i skye po thams cad
478b5('bum): kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ gal te 'du byed kyi
478b6('bum): mtshan ma'i dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan yin du zin na ni/ 'o na mtshan ma de'ang mi dmigs na/ 'di ltar brjod du med pa'i dbyings de rtogs par 'gyur ram/ byams pa/
478b7('bum): rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa'ang ma yin la/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang /
479a1('bum): 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa de
479a2('bum): las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad
479a3('bum): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings dang 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes
479a4('bum): bgyi ba dang / tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar
479a5('bum): dag gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci mchis pa mi dmigs pa lags sam/ 'on te ma mchis pa mi dmigs
479a6('bum): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la ni/ rang dbang nyid
479a7('bum): dam| yod pa nyid gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ gang gi tshe khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de/
479b1('bum): rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur ram/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas te rnam par mi rtogs pa de'i tshe rnam par mi rtogs par gzung
479b2('bum): bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags so/ /byams pa/ de lta yin na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la 'di ltar gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba
479b3('bum): dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar glo bur du ming du btags pa de rnam par rtog pa tsam
479b4('bum): du ma zad dam/ rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid do/ /de de ltar rnam par mi rtogs pa'i dbyings la gnas te rnam par rtog pa rnams dang bral bar gyur ba na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba
479b5('bum): zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags
479b6('bum): pa de la yod pa gang yin gang yod pa ni/ dmigs par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
479b7('bum): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos rab tu dbye ba mkhas pa la zhugs pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi/
480a1('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa du zhig tu
480a2('bum): rtogs par bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha
480a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos rab tu dbye ba mkhas pa la zhugs pas/ gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
480a4('bum): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni/ kun btags pa'i gzugs
480a5('bum): so| |'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i gzugs so/ /'di ni/ chos nyid kyi gzugs so/ /'di lta ste/ 'di ni/ kun btags pa'i tshor ba'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba'o/ /'di
480a6('bum): ni| chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ 'di ni/ kun brtags pa'i 'du shes so/ /'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i 'du shes so/ /'di ni/ chos nyid kyi 'du shes so/ /'di lta ste/ 'di dag
480a7('bum): ni| kun btags pa'i 'du byed rnams so/ /'di dag ni/ rnam par btags pa'i 'du byed rnams so/ /'di dag ni/ chos nyid kyi 'du byed rnams so/ /'di lta ste/ 'di ni/ kun btags
480b1('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni/ chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ 'di dag ni/ kun btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
480b2('bum): rnams kyi bar dag go / 'di dag ni/ rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni/ chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa
480b3('bum): dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ kun btags pa'i gzugs ni/ gang lags/ rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs
480b4('bum): ni| gang lags/ chos nyid kyi gzugs ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ kun btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun btags
480b5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni/ gang lags/ rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ gang lags/ chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ gang lags/
480b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad la brten nas
480b7('bum): gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni/ kun brtags pa'i gzugs so/ /byams pa/ gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang /
481a1('bum): 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang /
481a2('bum): tha snyad la brten nas tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni/ kun
481a3('bum): btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ kun btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go /'du byed kyi mtshan
481a4('bum): ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi chos nyid la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas mngon par brjod de/ gang la 'di ni/ gzugs so/ /zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba'o/ /zhes bya
481a5('bum): ba dang / 'du shes so/ /zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams so/ /zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'o/ /zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du
481a6('bum): shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad gang yin pa 'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i gzugs so/ /'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i 'du shes
481a7('bum): so| |'di dag ni/ rnam par btags pa 'di 'du byed rnams so/ /'di ni/ rnam par btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
481b1('bum): bar dag go / gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos nyid 'di ni/ gnas pa nyid dang / chos gnas pa'i dbyings dang / gang
481b2('bum): kun btags pa'i gzugs des rnam par btags pa'i gzugs rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang / ther zug ther zug gi dus su ngo bo nyid med pa kho na dang / chos la bdag med pa nyid dang / de
481b3('bum): bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni/ chos nyid kyi gzugs so/ /'di ni/ chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ chos nyid
481b4('bum): kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs
481b5('bum): gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis par lta ba'i gzugs ni/ gang lags/ rdzas su mchis par lta ba ni/ gang lags/ rdzas su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la/ rdzas su
481b6('bum): mchis pa'ang ma lags shing don dam pas rab tu phye bar lta ba ni/ gang lags/ tshor ba gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du shes gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du byed gsum po 'di dag dang /
481b7('bum): rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis pa dag ni/ gang lags/ rdzas su mchis pa dag ni/ gang lags/
482a1('bum): rdzas su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la/ rdzas su mchis pa'ang ma lags shing don dam pas rab tu phye ba dag ni/ gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
482a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ gang kun btags pa'i gzugs de ni/ rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o/ /rnam par btags
482a3('bum): pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste/ rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni/ ma yin no/ /gang chos nyid kyi gzugs de ni/
482a4('bum): rjes su med pa'ang ma yin/ rjes su yod pa'ang ma yin zhing don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o/ /gang kun btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
482a5('bum): rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni/ rjes su med par blta bar bya'o/ /gang rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes
482a6('bum): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni/ rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir rdzas su
482a7('bum): yod par blta bar bya ste/ rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni/ ma yin no/ /byams pa/ gang chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / byams
482b1('bum): pa| gang dag chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni/ rdzas su med pa'ang ma yin la/ rdzas su yod pa'ang ma yin zhing don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o/ /de skad
482b2('bum): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa'ang mchis
482b3('bum): la| de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa'ang mchis na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs
482b4('bum): zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /
482b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bka' stsal pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs nas
482b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par
482b7('bum): shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
483a1('bum): chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ kun btags pa'i gzugs la rdzas su med pa nyid gang yin pa de
483a2('bum): gzugs yin nam/ 'on te ma yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /de la gzugs zhes bya ba ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gang
483a3('bum): yin pa de ji ga gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis gang kun brtag pa'i gzugs de gzugs kyang ma yin/
483a4('bum): gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de ni/ gnyis su med pa ste/ ngas 'di la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes
483a5('bum): bya ba de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la brten nas gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang /
483a6('bum): btags pa dang / tha snyad du 'gyur ba rnam par btags pa'i gzugs rdzas su yod pa nyid gang yin pa de ji ga gzugs ma yin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma
483a7('bum): lags so/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam par btags pa'i gzugs de nyid la kun brtags pa'i gzugs des de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhing / de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa
483b1('bum): gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang rnam par btags pa'i gzugs de'ang gzugs kyang
483b2('bum): ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de gnyis su med pa ste/ gnas de la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya
483b3('bum): ba de ni| gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal bar rig par bya'o/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang chos nyid kyi gzugs bdag med pas rab tu phye ba'i gzugs
483b4('bum): de dag gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /chos nyid kyis gzugs de nyid kyi gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom
483b5('bum): ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de'ang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs
483b6('bum): kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de ni/ gnyis su med pa ste/ ngas de la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de ni/ gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /zhes bka'
483b7('bum): stsal par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de skad ces
484a1('bum): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
484a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar gzugs la gnyis su ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas shing / de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
484a3('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la mkhas pa/ mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa'i yongs su 'tshal ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ ji lta
484a4('bum): bu| spong ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ ji lta bu/ mngon sum du bgyid pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ ji lta bu/ bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ ji lta bur blta bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
484a5('bum): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas 'di ltar dbu
484a6('bum): ma'i lam la zhugs pas gang gzugs yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin/ yongs su mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o/ /gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
484a7('bum): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin/ yongs su mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o/ /gang gzugs
484b1('bum): spong ba'ang ma yin mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o/ /gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du spong ba'ang
484b2('bum): ma yin| mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o/ /gang gzugs spong ba mngon sum du'ang mi byed la/ mngon sum du mi byed pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o/ /gang gzugs
484b3('bum): spang ba'i phyir lam sgom pa'ang ma yin/ mi sgom pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i sgom pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
484b4('bum): chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
484b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di lta bu'i yongs su 'tshal ba dang / spong ba dang / mngon sum du bgyid pa dang / bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las
484b6('bum): 'das pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las
484b7('bum): 'das pa ni/ zab bo/ /mchog tu zab bo/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang
485a1('bum): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ltar zab pa dang / mchog tu zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub
485a2('bum): sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ 'di ltar/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir zab pa dang / mchog tu zab pa zhes bya'o/ /de
