485a3('bum): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan
485a4('bum): las 'das pa ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma lags/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ gzhan gyi don las brtsams te
485a5('bum): 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bas mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin no/ /bdag gi don las brtsams te mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong bas/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma yin no/ /
485a6('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don
485a7('bum): las brtsams te 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong na/ de 'khor ba yongs su ma btang bas/ 'dis ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su btang bar mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang
485b1('bum): chub sems dpa' bdag gi don las brtsams te mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong na/ 'dis ji ltar 'khor ba yongs su btang bar mi 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
485b2('bum): stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'khor ba la'ang 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mya ngan las 'das
485b3('bum): pa nyid du rnam par mi rtog ste/ de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa de dag mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de
485b4('bum): 'khor ba la 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog pas/ 'khor ba las yid byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du mi rtog pas/ mya ngan las
485b5('bum): 'das pa las nyams par yang mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin du 'khor ba na'ang mi nyams so/ /de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa de/ rigs pa 'dis 'khor ba'ang yongs su mi gtong
485b6('bum): la| mya ngan las 'das pa'ang yongs su mi gtong bar rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
485b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pas 'khor ba ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa'ang ma
486a1('bum): mchis shing / mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa'ang ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te blangs pa ma
486a2('bum): mchis na/ ji ltar ma btang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ nga ni/ 'di ltar 'khor ba len to/ /zhe'am/ mi len to/ /zhes mi smra'o/ /byams pa/ 'on
486a3('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyis sems la dbang thob pa/ thabs la mkhas pas 'khor
486a4('bum): b a bstan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor ba yongs su
486a5('bum): mi gtong ba'o/ /zhes nga mi smra'o/ /stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o/ zhes nga smra'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa
486a6('bum): dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom
486a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa
486b1('bum): gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos de dag dang / stong pa nyid de'i dngos po dang /
486b2('bum): dngos po med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ spros pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus par blta'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
486b3('bum): dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci nyan thos thams cad gcig tu nges par gtan du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
486b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ khams sna tshogs pa/ khams du ma pa ste/ khams sna tshogs pa/ khams du ma pa'i 'jig
486b5('bum): rten de na sems can gyi rigs dang / rang bzhin mang du dmigs te/ byams pa/ gang thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi
486b6('bum): rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu'ang yod/ gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te dman pa nyid thob la/ de nyid kyis chog par 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu'ang yod/ gang thog ma nyid
486b7('bum): nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te dman pa nyid thob la/ dman par shes nas de tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin gyi/ de'i gong du bzang po'i bye brag tshol zhing bzang po thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs
487a1('bum): kyi bye brag de lta bu'ang yod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
487a2('bum): 'das| sems can rnams kyi rigs kyi rnam pa gsum po gang lags pa de/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer kyang skye ba ma
487a3('bum): mchis pas ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ sgrub pa nyid de'i skye ba lags par ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/
487a4('bum): de'i skye ba las dang / nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'gyur bar ni/ nga mi 'dogs kyi/ de'i skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sprul pa dang / yongs su bsngos pa'o/ /zhes nga 'dogs so/ /de
487a5('bum): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag
487a6('bum): don du gnyer zhing bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rlabs po che dang / che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni/ ngo mtshar
487a7('bum): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che ni/ gang lags/ che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
487b1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang / 'khor los sgyur ba nyid thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi phun
487b2('bum): sum tshogs pa thams cad don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ de dag la mi chags shing mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
487b3('bum): rnams 'di lta ste/ 'du byed yongs su mi gtong bas/ de la ma chags pa'i bde ba dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya bar
487b4('bum): 'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ de dag gi che ba nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam par blta bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
487b5('bum): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
487b6('bum): bslab pa ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rnams la slob par 'tshal bas/ bla na med pa
487b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi lags so/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po sum brgya gsum pa/ de nas bcom ldan
488a1('bum): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol bar 'dod
488a2('bum): p a'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo des ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra
488a3('bum): dbyangs mi zad par sgrogs pa'i drung na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
488a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
488a5('bum): 'di yongs su tshol ba na ji ltar yongs su btsal lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems
488a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba na lus la tshad char mi 'dzin/ srog la mi lta/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa
488a7('bum): dag la mi gnas par yongs su btsal pas yongs su btsal to/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na bar snang las sgra thos par gyur te/ rigs
488b1('bum): kyi bu| shar phyogs su song zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang /
488b2('bum): bza' ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / btung ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa mi
488b3('bum): bskyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa de ltar song zhig /nang ngam phyi rol gang la'ang sems smon par ma byed cig /rigs kyi bu/ shar dang / lhor ma lta bar song zhig /nub dang / byang
488b4('bum): dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams su'ang ma lta bar song zhig /rigs kyi bu/ ci nas 'jigs tshogs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang /
488b5('bum): ci nas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song zhig /gang 'di las g.yos pa de ni/ rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro/ /ci las
488b6('bum): nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ba de ni/ 'khor ba la spyod do/ /gang 'khor ba la spyod
488b7('bum): pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su mi thob bo/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de la 'ang skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin du bya'o/ /de
489a1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni/ sems can thams cad la snang ba byed par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces smras pa
489a2('bum): dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rtag tu ngu / legs so/ /legs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus
489a3('bum): yang sgra thos te 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos dag la mos pa bskyed la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal
489a4('bum): bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis mtshan ma yongs su spang bar bya/ dngos po yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can du lta bu yongs su spong bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag
489a5('bum): spang bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / ma 'gag pa'i
489a6('bum): chos rnams ston pa dag la bsnyen par bya ba/ bsten par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na/ ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs
489a7('bum): bam du chud pa'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis ston par 'du
489b1('bum): shes bskyed par bya zhing / khyod kyis byas pa bzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ shes
489b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bdag gis thos pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
489b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro/ /dal ba phun sum
489b4('bum): tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis
489b5('bum): 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'o/ /khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya
489b6('bum): bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ bdud sdig can ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sgra dang /
489b7('bum): dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dge bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bsgrub ste/ de dag des zil gyis mnan nas thabs la mkhas pas 'grogs shing bstan pa dang / bsnyen
490a1('bum): par byed pa'ang yod de/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o/ /gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni/ thabs
490a2('bum): mkhas pa de mi shes kyi/ 'di ni/ thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so/ /'di ni/ sems can gyi tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la
490a3('bum): bsten cing 'grogs te bsnyen par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ gang la'ang chags pa'am/ sgrib pa med kyi/ skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu/ khyod nyid
490a4('bum): kyis yang dag pa'i tshul so so brtag par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par
490a5('bum): byang ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ chos thams cad ni/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi
490a6('bum): lam lta bu/ brag cha lta bu/ mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i phyir 'brang na/ ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol
490a7('bum): tu phyin pa la nges par 'gyur bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis bdud kyi las la soms shig /rigs kyi bu/ gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i
490b1('bum): rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing mi sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis phyir dgyed par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid mi skyo bas
490b2('bum): dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ /zhes thos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas shar phyogs ga la ba der
490b3('bum): song ba dang / ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so/ /snyam nas des phyogs de nyid na ngu zhing mya ngan byed de smre zhing 'dug go /des
490b4('bum): phyogs de na nyin zhag gcig 'das par byed/ nyin zhag gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ bdun 'das kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du lus
490b5('bum): ngal ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ bza' ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi
490b6('bum): bskyed| nyin mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ grang ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ tsha ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi
490b7('bum): ba'i dus byas na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa 'byung ba ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan
491a1('bum): gang yang mi 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang de'i tshe bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par
491a2('bum): 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du
491a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas legs so/ /zhes bya bar byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod tshig de skad smra ba legs so/ /legs so/ /ji ltar khyod kyis de ltar yongs su
491a4('bum): btsal ba de bzhin du/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
491a5('bum): phyin pa yongs su btsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang / spro ba 'di dang / don du gnyer ba 'di dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'brang zhing shar phyogs nyid du
491a6('bum): song zhig dang / rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na spos ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i rab rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang /
491a7('bum): shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zhing du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang /
491b1('bum): mis gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya ngag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs khri nyam mi nga ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/ grong khyer
491b2('bum): kyi khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir ba rin po che sna bdun las legs par byas shing bskor ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mda' yab rnams ni/ dzam+bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mtho zhing
491b3('bum): tshad dang ldan pa/ mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes te rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mda' yab las shing skyes pa thams cad
491b4('bum): las kyang rin po che'i tha gu byung bas mda' yab gnyis pa gzhan dang 'brel ba/ grong khyer thams cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas khebs te gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung
491b5('bum): gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo tshogs pa rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na/ sgra 'jam
491b6('bum): zhing snyan la yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag rtse dga' zhing dga'
491b7('bum): mgur spyod do/ /grong khyer de khor yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing / chu ha cang yang mi grang / chu ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod do/ /chu de la sngon gyi rnam par smin pas grub pa rin po
492a1('bum): che sna bdun gyi gru dag yod de/ der sems can de dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing rab tu rgyu'o/ /chu de thams cad kyang me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma
492a2('bum): dkar po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la/ dri zhim po'i ngad ldan pa gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod
492a3('bum): pa'i me tog gi rigs las de na med pa gang yang med do/ /grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug
492a4('bum): pa sha stag ste/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug thams cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi me
492a5('bum): tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu da khebs shing me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po de dag
492a6('bum): thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i phang lo tsam ste/ sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser
492a7('bum): po 'byung ba/ dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba/ dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba dag yod do/ /
492b1('bum): rdzing bu de dag thams cad na ngang dur dang / khrung khrung dang / bya ka ran+Da ba dang / bzhad sgra 'byin pa dag yod do/ /skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing ris su bcad pa med de/
492b2('bum): 'di ltar sems can dag yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa
492b3('bum): yin no| |rigs kyi bu/ grong khyer de dag gi dbus kyi gzhi mdo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ khor yug tu dpag tshad
492b4('bum): kyi tshad tsam yod pa/ rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/ ra ba rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba zhig yod de/ khang pa de na khang ba'i longs spyod du rtag tu
492b5('bum): rab dga' zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med ces bya ba dang / mya ngan bral zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ skyed
492b6('bum): mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde ldan zhes bya ba
492b7('bum): dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi ngos gcig ni/ gser las byas/ ngos gnyis pa ni/ dngul las byas/ ngos gsum pa ni/ bai DUR+Ya
493a1('bum): las byas/ ngos bzhi pa ni/ shel las byas/ nang gi sa gzhi ni/ ke ke ru la gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste/ rdzing bu de dag re re la'ang them skas them pa rin po che
493a2('bum): sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang dzam+bu chu ba'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so/ /rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni/
493a3('bum): me tog ku mu da dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing ngang dur dang / khrung khrung dang / bzhad rnams skad 'byin to/ /rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu me tog gi shing
493a4('bum): rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ shing de dag rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas/ rdzing bu de thams cad kyi chu'ang tsan+dan gyi drir phyogs shing kha dog dang ldan/ dri dang
493a5('bum): ldan no| |de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/
493a6('bum): /grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang / bud med gang gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam/ rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga'
493a7('bum): zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste/
493b1('bum): dga' mgur spyod cing / de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ /sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang gong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub
493b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / bai DUR+Ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/ shing bal bting ba/ stan nang tshangs
493b3('bum): can bting ba/ stan snying po can du byas pa/ ka shi ka'i ras bting ba/ 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams te/ steng gi bar snang la ras kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres shing / de ltar
493b4('bum): chos la gus par byed pas sa phyogs de khor yug kyang me tog kha dog sna lnga pa dag mngon par gtor cing / sa phyogs de'ang spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par
493b5('bum): byed de| de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can de dag ni/ de ltar bur gus par byed cing /
493b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to/ /de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang / mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po/ srog chags stong phrag mang
493b7('bum): po| srog chags 'bum phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ni/ lung nod/ la la ni/ kha ton byed de/ la la ni/ yi ger 'dri/ la la ni/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de/
494a1('bum): sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go /rigs
494a2('bum): kyi bu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song zhig dang / de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ yun ring po
494a3('bum): nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/ yang
494a4('bum): dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ des kyang sngon du da ltar khyod ji ltar 'tshol ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod nyin
494a5('bum): mtshan du yid la byed la rgyun ma bcad par song zhig dang / ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
494a6('bum): rtag tu ngus de thos nas dga' mgu yid rangs/ rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na/ yid
494a7('bum): la byed pa gzhan mi bskyed kyi/ gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa/ zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
494b1('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par byed cing / chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis
494b2('bum): nam mthong snyam sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sa phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ chos thams cad la mi
494b3('bum): gnas pa'i 'du shes pa bskyed nas de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs
494b4('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
494b5('bum): cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
494b6('bum): thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma
494b7('bum): rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
495a1('bum): thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams
495a2('bum): cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang / tshig dang / 'bru sna tshogs bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ma khengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
495a3('bum): dang / rang bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
495a4('bum): ming dang / nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang / 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i
495a5('bum): mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ces bya ba'i ting nge
495a6('bum): 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
495a7('bum): dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge mngon par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
495b1('bum): 'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya
495b2('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyis rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes
495b3('bum): pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya
495b4('bum): mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag med par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur ba'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
495b5('bum): 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya
495b6('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi
495b7('bum): 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma zhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
496a1('bum): 'dzin dang / 'od zer bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur te/ de ting nge
496a2('bum): ' dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
496a3('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ tshig 'di skad kyang
496a4('bum): gsung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ nged kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal te/ yongs su tshol ba na'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob ste/
496a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to/ /nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di
496a6('bum): dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas na/ gang mnyam par bzhag par bya ba'am/ ldang bar bya ba'am/ byang chub tu spyad pa'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
496a7('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rdzas su mi mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos
496b1('bum): gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas nged kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
496b2('bum): dang / dpe byang bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang /
496b3('bum): yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad bzung ba'am/ mtha' bstan par mi nus na/ nyan
496b4('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na/ khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya
496b5('bum): ste| rigs kyi bu/ don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pa la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no/ /khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin du
496b6('bum): gus pa bskyed par bya'o/ /phang par bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
496b7('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gi dge ba'i
497a1('bum): bshes gnyen gang lags/ de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
497a2('bum): chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la bslab
497a3('bum): bo| |rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ khyod yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin gyi/ des khyod la ci bsgo ba bzhin du zungs shig /rigs kyi bu/ gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems
497a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa gnyis sam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang mgo la thod bzhin du thogs
497a5('bum): shing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag
497a6('bum): thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan lon pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i mthus khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te/ shes rab kyi
497a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
497b1('bum): rtag tu ngu dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de'ang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/ langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/
497b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems
497b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni/ gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag yongs su 'dzin pa/ bdag
497b4('bum): gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen/ yun ring po nas des bdag gi don byas pa yin gyi/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste phyin nas de
497b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu byang chub
497b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / ri mo dang / gus par bya ba nye bar gzhag ste/ nye bar gzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so/ /bdag gis ji lta bu'i
497b7('bum): bkur sti bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag ni/ dbul te gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
498a1('bum): la bdag gis bkur stir bya ba'i gos rin po che'am/ gser ram/ nor bu'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUr+ya'am/ dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byu ru'am/
498a2('bum): dngul lam/ sa le sbram mam/ me tog gam/ spos sam/ me tog phreng ngam/ byug pa'am/ gdugs de lta bu'ang bdag la med na/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos
498a3('bum): 'phags kyi drung du song na ni/ bdag gis tshul ma yin pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba'am/ rangs pa'ang mi skye'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
498a4('bum): chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang / bla ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas song nas mthar gyis grong gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / de'i grong bar gyi dbus su de 'di snyam
498a5('bum): du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis lus btsongs la de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o/ /yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig cing zad
498a6('bum): de btsongs la/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa dag 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/ 'di lta bu'i sems
498a7('bum): can chen po la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ni/ ma yin no/ /snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus grong bar du 'dug ste/ mi su nyo 'dod/ mi su nyo 'dod ces sgra bsgrags
498b1('bum): shing skad kyis bos so/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas byang chub sems dpa'
498b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
498b3('bum): byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyi lha dag gis mi thub par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par
498b4('bum): 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
498b5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed/ sems can gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis 'di la bar chad bya'o/ /snyam
498b6('bum): nas bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mi su nyo 'dod/ su nga nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra mi thos par 'gyur ba
498b7('bum): de lta bur yongs su bsgribs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe bdag nye ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma phyung ste/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus
499a1('bum): btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya snyam na/ lus nyo ba'ang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye ma bdag ni/ rnyed pa ngan pa
499a2('bum): rnyed do| |snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongs
499a3('bum): su btang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la bdag gis bag ma par bya'o/ /snyam ste/ lha'i dbang po
499a4('bum): b rgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i chad byad du mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
499a5('bum): rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di ltar yid mi dga' zhing yid gdung la mchi sa ma 'byung ba ci nyes/ des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ kho bo ni/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir
499a6('bum): bdag nyid btsongs te chos la mchod pa bya bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba de kho bos ma rnyed nas de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so/ /kye ma nga ni/ bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs
499a7('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya snyam na/ bdag gis lus nyo ba'ang ma
499b1('bum): rnyed do| |snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo la mis ni/ bya ba med kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo
499b2('bum): mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dag kho bo la dgos na/ de rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
499b3('bum): po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do/ /
499b4('bum): bdag gi lus ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa rnams la yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /snyam ste/ de sems dga' ba dang / sems bde ba dang / sems rab tu
499b5('bum): dga' bar gyur nas bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ kho bo'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no/ /des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod rin du
499b6('bum): ci 'dod pa sbyin no/ /zhes byas pa dang / des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de kho bo la byin cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
499b7('bum): chen po rtag tu ngu mtshan rnon po thogs nas lag pa g.yas pa phug ste khrag gzugs so/ /brla g.yas pa sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo / /de nas tshong
500a1('bum): d pon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu brla sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu
500a2('bum): rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha byed pa/ bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o/ /snyam
500a3('bum): n as tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras
500a4('bum): so| |rigs kyi bu/ khyod ci'i phyir khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/ rtag tu ngus bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i
500a5('bum): khye'u 'di la bcings te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o/ /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de nas tshong
500a6('bum): dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang yang
500a7('bum): btsongs te rigs kyi bu de la bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des de la smras pa/ bu mo/ rigs kyi bu de ni/ gang la kho bos bslab par bya ba'i
500b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/ kho bos de la bslabs na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
500b2('bum): nas sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu'ang thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 'od zer mtha'
500b3('bum): yas pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
500b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa drug dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam
500b5('bum): gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyang mngon
500b6('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang gis sems can thams cad la kun du bgo bsha' bya ba'o bla na med pa'i chos rin po che'ang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
500b7('bum): mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni/ ngo mtshar te/ rigs
501a1('bum): kyi bu| chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su btang bar bya ba yin na/ gcig lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis
501a2('bum): chos 'di dag rgya cher yongs su brjod na/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i gser ram/ nor bu'am/ mu
501a3('bum): tig gam/ bai DUr+ya'am/ dngul lam/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ spos sam/ me tog phreng ngam/ byug pa'am/ phye ma'am/ gos sam/ gdugs sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa
501a4('bum): de khyod la sbyin gyi/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig /bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der
501a5('bum): dong la bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u'i
501a6('bum): cha byad mi snang bar byas nas bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod de ltar yi
501a7('bum): dam la brtan pa ni/ legs so/ /legs so/ /'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang
501b1('bum): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
501b2('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo la snying dang / khrag dang / rkang gis bya ba med kyi/ kho bo khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis dam pa slongs shig /
501b3('bum): rigs kyi bu/ khyod la dam pa ji lta bu zhig sbyin par bya/ des de la smras pa/ brgya byin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa bdag la stsol cig /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/
501b4('bum): yul 'di kho bo'i yul du gyur pa ma yin te/ yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyi/ dam pa gzhan slongs shig /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu
501b5('bum): ngus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di la ni/ lha'i dbang po brtson pa chung bar gyis shig /lha'i dbang po/ bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs bya'o/ /
501b6('bum): lha'i dbang po/ bden pa gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
501b7('bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan te/ bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med par mkhyen ce na/ bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon gyi bzhin du gyur cig
502a1('bum): ces byas pa dang / skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
502a2('bum): chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi bzhin du gnas par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa med par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lan glan par
502a3('bum): spobs pa ma skyes nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu tshur shog /kho
502a4('bum): mo'i khyim ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /kho mos pha ma las nor blangs te/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
502a5('bum): de la'ang bkur sti bya ba sbyin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo de 'grogs nas de rang gi khyim ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
502a6('bum): mo de bdag gi khyim du phyin nas pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab yum/ gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang /
502a7('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i cha byad mang po dag stsol cig /bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal ba'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang
502b1('bum): lhan cig dgyer gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i
502b2('bum): slad du mchi'o/ /de'ang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de su zhig /bu
502b3('bum): mo/ rigs kyi bu de da ltar gang na 'dug /bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de da ltar 'o skol gyi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
502b4('bum): byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar par bgyi bar 'tshal bas/ de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag
502b5('bum): nyid btsongs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo bar su'ang
502b6('bum): ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas mi dga' bar sems shing mchis te/ des nga ni/ lus 'tshong bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba ma rnyed do/ /zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i
502b7('bum): gzugs su bsgyur te de la 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang / rtag tu ngu des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub
503a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la'ang bkur stir bya'o/ /nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ de la rag las pas 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i
503a2('bum): phyir ro| |zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod ni/ nga mi 'dod de/ 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang / khrag
503a3('bum): dang | rus pa dang / rkang dag dgos so/ /zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu des yi ma sad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no/ /zhes smras nas de mtshon rnon po thogs te bdag gi lag pa phug
503a4('bum): nas khrag gzugs/ brla'i sha btogs te rus pa gcog tu song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no/ /snyam nas de khrag gzags pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis
503a5('bum): pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do/ /mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad bgyis so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar
503a6('bum): bdag nyid kyis lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad mchi ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no/ /de
503a7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni/ dbul te/ nga la nor gzhan ci'ang med do/ /zhes mchi'o/ /bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod
503b1('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchod par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya'o/ /zhes mchi nas bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis
503b2('bum): te| rigs kyi bu/ des khyed la yon tan gyi rnam pa'am/ khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
503b3('bum): dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas bdag
503b4('bum): kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa ni/ shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa ste/ ngo mtshar to/ /rigs kyi bu/
503b5('bum): 'di ni| chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na/ bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la/ ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa mi bgyi/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i
503b6('bum): phyir mi gdab snyam nas rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig /khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang
503b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i nor mang po de dag khyod la sbyin no/ /bdag kyang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
504a1('bum): chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o/ /bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa bgyi'o/ /gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med
504a2('bum): pa dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o/ /zhes bgyis shing mchis na/ yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po bdag la stsal du gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu
504a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po sum brgya gzhi pa ste/ tha
504a4('bum): ma| de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na/ chos de dag ni/ gcig tu nges par bsam gyis mi
504a5('bum): khyab pa| 'jig rten thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byed na/ khyod
504a6('bum): nged kyis gnang gi / bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags blta zhing mchod du nged kyang 'gro yi/ nged 'gro ba'i skabs phye zhig /de nas bu mo
504a7('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir chas te pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni/ dge ba'i phyogs gang gi'ang
504b1('bum): bar chad mi bgyid do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya'ang rgyan gyis brgyan/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to/ /rgyan gyis brgyan nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs thogs/ bdug
504b2('bum): pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag thogs/ gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag thogs/ rin po che sna
504b3('bum): tshogs rnam pa tha dad bdag kyang thogs te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang po mang du bskur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang shing rta gcig tu zhugs te bu
504b4('bum): m o lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su dong ste mthar gyis song
504b5('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyang ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi
504b6('bum): ra ba rim bdun gyis bskor ba/ rta ba bas bdun yod pa/ 'obs rim bdun dang / ta la'i phreng rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis
504b7('bum): yod pa/ 'byor cing rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs
505a1('bum): khri nyam mi nga ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa lags par byas pa mthong ngo / /de'i dbus kyi gzhi mod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
505a2('bum): chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos 'chad pa mthong ste/ mthong
505a3('bum): ma thag tu de dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no/ /de mthong nas 'di snyam du
505a4('bum): sems te/ bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni/ bdag gis mi cha'o/ /snyam nas de nas shing rta de
505a5('bum): las babs pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang / bu mo lnga brgya de dag dang mnyam du shing rta de las babs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo
505a6('bum): la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te bkod pa chad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo / /de'i tshe
505a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ tsan+dan dmar pos brgyan cing / mu tig
505b1('bum): gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te/ de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do/ /bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa
505b2('bum): bzhi'ang phyogs bzhir btags te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir a ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug par byed do/ /khang bu brtsegs pa de'i dbus
505b3('bum): su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/
505b4('bum): khang bu brtsegs pa de'ang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo
505b5('bum): lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang bu brtsegs pa de bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong / lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang / lha'i
505b6('bum): tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i dngul sil ma dag gis khang bu brtsegs pa de la 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor bar mthong ngo / /lha'i sil snyan
505b7('bum): dag kyang thos so/ /mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i dbang po/ khyod lha stong phrag du ma dag
506a1('bum): dang rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir me tog man+dA ra ba dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing / mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor/
506a2('bum): lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams par snang la ci'i phyir rdung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di
506a3('bum): skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas
506a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur
506a5('bum): ba yin na/ khyod mi shes sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka/ shes rab
506a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de ni/ khang bu brtsegs pa 'di'i
506a7('bum): nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rgya rim bdun gyis btab nas bzhag ste/ kho bo cag gis
506b1('bum): khyod la bstan par dka'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dag dang tshogs nas de dag gis me tog dang /
506b2('bum): me tog phreng gi chun po dang / gos rin po che dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
506b3('bum): gser dang / dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
506b4('bum): 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir shas shas kyis bzhag go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang /
506b5('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
506b6('bum): 'phags ga la ba der song ste phyin nas chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng
506b7('bum): dang | byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog gis gtor/ mngon par
507a1('bum): gtor| mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na me tog gi khang pa brtsegs
507a2('bum): pa zhig tu gyur to/ /gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag nam mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to/ /chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi
507a3('bum): dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
507a4('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di 'di ltar rdzu
507a5('bum): 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na med pa yang dag par
507a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
507a7('bum): chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs
507b1('bum): pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
507b2('bum): 'phags kyis chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig / bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon sum du gyur cig /shes
507b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par shog cig / byang
507b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la ston par gyur cig / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
507b5('bum): 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan
507b6('bum): zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis shes rab kyi
507b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur stir byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi
508a1('bum): rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes byed cing thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
508a2('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol zhing 'brog
508a3('bum): dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na sgra thos pa/ rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs su song shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bdag gis sgra de thos nas shar phyogs ga
508a4('bum): la ba de logs su mchis nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi/ su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so/ /
508a5('bum): snyam ste| des bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa ni/ ma byung gi /gzhan du
508a6('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te ji srid du mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba sgra de la ma dris
508a7('bum): so| |snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/ de 'di skad gsung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ khyed 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang /
508b1('bum): grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs
508b2('bum): pa'i sku gzugs de dag las bdag gis 'di thos nas ji ltar btams pa bzhin du shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston
508b3('bum): pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas
508b4('bum): sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so/ /de nyan pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to/ /bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
508b5('bum): khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
508b6('bum): skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan nas mi snang
508b7('bum): bar gyur to/ /bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo/ /de nas yang
509a1('bum): bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ dge
509a2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin
509a3('bum): gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa de bdag la ston par 'gyur snyam nas rigs kyi bu/ khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
509a4('bum): de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag zhu na/ ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa 'tshal zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba de ltar de
509a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bdun cu rtsa
509a6('bum): gsum pa'o/ / //de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
509a7('bum): chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni/ gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du'ang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos so/ /
509b1('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi skye ba la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang
509b2('bum): dag pa'i mtha' la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ stong pa nyid la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin
509b3('bum): pa de ni| de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji lta ba bzhin la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'dod chags dang
509b4('bum): bral ba la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'gog pa la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de
509b5('bum): ni| de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ nam mkha'i khams la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos de dag
509b6('bum): las de bzhin gshegs pa gud na med de/ rigs kyi bu/ chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
509b7('bum): ste| rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su byar med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o/ /rigs
510a1('bum): kyi bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi nyi mas gdungs pas sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas der chu btung ngo / /zhes de
510a2('bum): dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu de gang nas 'ongs/ gang du song / chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ byang
510a3('bum): phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song / rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu/ mi nyi mas gdungs shing byas pa'i rang bzhin
510a4('bum): can| shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyis smig rgyu mthong nas chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes skyed kyi/ de la chu ni/ rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so/ /chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs
510a5('bum): kyi bu| de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu/ gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ sgrar mngon par zhen par byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
510a6('bum): byon pa'am bzhud par rtog go / gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni/ byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can zhes bya
510a7('bum): ste| dper na/ mi de chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gzugs kyi skur mi lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chos kyi sku'o/ /
510b1('bum): rigs kyi bu/ chos nyid ni/ 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma
510b2('bum): sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung pu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la'ang byon
510b3('bum): pa'am bzhud pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/
510b4('bum): bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las sad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam
510b5('bum): du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ gang du bzhud/ rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rmi lam la chos gang yang grub pa mi gda'o/ /rmi lam ni/ rdzun te/ yang dag pa
510b6('bum): ma lags pa'o/ /chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang su dag
510b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa mi shes pa de dag ni/ ming mtshan gyi sku dang / gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/
511a1('bum): de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par rtog go /gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis
511a2('bum): pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni/ 'khor ba 'gro ba drug por dong ba/ 'dong ba/ 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de dag thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o/ /
511a3('bum): de dag thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta
511a4('bum): bu'o| |zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa shes pa de dag ni/ chos gang la'ang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go /gang dag chos gang la'ang 'ong ba'am/
511a5('bum): 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes so/ /gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ de
511a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am bzhud par mi rtog go / gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
511a7('bum): la nye bar gyur ba ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni/ yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/ de dang de dag ni/ 'jig
511b1('bum): rten gyi sbyin gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni/ shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams
511b2('bum): dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag 'byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu med
511b3('bum): par byung ba ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang / rkyen dang / gzhi la rag las pa yin te/ brten nas byung ngo / /rin po che de dag 'gag pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang mi 'pho mod kyi/ rkyen de dag
511b4('bum): yod na| rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do/ /rkyen de dag med na/ rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba'ang med par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par
511b5('bum): grub pa'ang gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang ma bzhud do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa'ang ma yin te/ sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa
511b6('bum): yin pas/ rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa/ sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no/ /de dag kyang rkyen rnams yod na/ sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen dag med na/ sku
511b7('bum): mngon par 'grub pa'ang mi snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pi wang gi sgra byung ba'ang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gags pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang du'ang mi 'pho ste/ brten
512a1('bum): nas 'byung ba/ rgyu la rag las/ rkyen la rag las pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ pi wang gi khog pa la brten/ pags pa la brten/ rgyud la brten/ shing bu la brten/
512a2('bum): rgyud rten la brten/ mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas pi wang de las sgra 'byung ste/ sgra de'ang pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / shing
512a3('bum): bu las ma byung / rgyud rten las ma byung / mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra ma byung mod kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgrar grag la/ sgra de 'gags pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro
512a4('bum): ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su grub pa'ang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin te/
512a5('bum): rgyu gcig gis ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa'ang ma yin no/ /rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las
512a6('bum): byung ba yin te/ de ni/ gang nas kyang ma byon te/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang du'ang mi bzhud de/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud
512a7('bum): pa de ltar blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs
512b1('bum): pa dang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs
512b2('bum): mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe sa g.yo ba chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
512b3('bum): 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang
512b4('bum): dkrogs shing spa bkong bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems
512b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to/ /dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing / me tog gi char dag kyang bab
512b6('bum): bo| |lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog gis 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/
512b7('bum): mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa gang 'jig
513a1('bum): tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa thos so/ /zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang
513a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sa g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras
513a3('bum): pa| rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byin mi bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te kho bos bstan pas srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang /
513a4('bum): srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med
513a5('bum): cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag
513a6('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris pas sems can 'di snyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni/ bdag
513a7('bum): gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
513b1('bum): byang chub la phyir the tshom mi bya'o/ /bdag ni/ the tshom med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang rangs pa
513b2('bum): de dang ldan pas ta la bdun du nam mkha' la 'phags nas ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste/ bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur
513b3('bum): sti bya'o| |snyam du sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas de'i sems sems kyis shes nas
513b4('bum): de la lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dag byin te 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig /'di ni/ ngas khyod
513b5('bum): yongs su bzung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyi mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta bur
513b6('bum): bskal ba grangs med dpag tu med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ rnyed par dka'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang
513b7('bum): po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas bdag gi lus kyis byang chub
514a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang / zham ring
