514a2('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo/ /des bdag gi lus phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go /de nas
514a3('bum): tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang / 'khor lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ bdag cag kyang khyod la lus
514a4('bum): 'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur cig /khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur stir bgyi/ de
514a5('bum): dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo dag /khyed kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam
514a6('bum): pas gnas par byed na/ kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang bu mo khyed kho bos blang ngo / /bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi
514a7('bum): rjes su mthun par 'jug go / khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la
514b1('bum): sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing rta lnga brgya'ang brgyan nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la phul te/ rigs kyi bu/
514b2('bum): bdag ni/ 'khor 'di dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la legs so/ /zhes bya ba
514b3('bum): byin te| rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /yongs su gtong ba'i sems de
514b4('bum): lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de ltar na/ chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
514b5('bum): thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di
514b6('bum): lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris so/ /de nas
514b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
515a1('bum): chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu la byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
515a2('bum): po chos 'phags stan las langs te bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par gyur nas de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di
515a3('bum): ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/ 'dug pa'am/ nyal bar byed pa ni/ bdag gis mi cha la/ 'di ni/ ma legs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
515a4('bum): 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
515a5('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / shes
515a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma
515a7('bum): byung / gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung / ro la brkam pa ma skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam
515b1('bum): ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams
515b2('bum): na| bdag gis phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyi/ legs par byugs la me tog sna tshogs gtor te sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes
515b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byug par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang byang
515b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du'i rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go /de nas byang chub sems
515b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin las ldang ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi
515b6('bum): dbus su 'jug ste chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /zhes grag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu lha'i sgra de thos pa dang / dga' mgu yid rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba
515b7('bum): dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa bshams so/ /de nas bu mo de dag gis
516a1('bum): rang rang gi bla gos phud de stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo / /de nas
516a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sa phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na/ bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas ci nas byang chub sems
516a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu chu ma rnyed nas yid mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de'ang
516a4('bum): mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
516a5('bum): gi lus phug nas khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni/ rdul che ste/ 'di nas rdul gyi khams byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems
516a6('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na/ bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'di ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni/ bla'i/ nus pa med
516a7('bum): pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni/ cir yang ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems
516b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mtshon rnon po blangs te bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu chag chag btab bo/ /byang chub sems
516b2('bum): d pa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te rang rang gi lus phug nas rang rang gi khrag
516b3('bum): gis sa phyogs der chag btab ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad bya ba'i glags rnyed par mi 'gyur bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / bu
516b4('bum): mo de dag sems gzhan du gyur pa med do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di/ 'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang / 'di ltar yi dam
516b5('bum): la brtan pa dang / 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ bla
516b6('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las sems can thar bar bya'o/ /snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni/
516b7('bum): ngo mtshar to/ /snyam du sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan+dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan+dan gyi chu de'i dri dam pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sa
517a1('bum): phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya tshang bar dris khyab bo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces
517a2('bum): smras so| |rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba bla na med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
517a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
517a4('bum): pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
517a5('bum): chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni/ bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ni/ byas/ chag chag ni/ btab na/ bdag gi me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
517a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
517a7('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba 'di dag long la khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram pa gyis shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems
517b1('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la'ang gtor cig / ces des de la lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba khal stong byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
517b2('bum): tu ngus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni/ sa phyogs der me tog bkram pa byas so/ /me tog kha cig gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to/ /
517b3('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas stan pa ting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor
517b4('bum): brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus byang chub sems dpa' sems
517b5('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo/ /de nas
517b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid
517b7('bum): do| |chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams
518a1('bum): cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
518a2('bum): pa khengs pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rog gcig pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu
518a3('bum): med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag
518a4('bum): pa med pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /ri rab sna tshogs pa
518a5('bum): nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs nyid do/ /nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do/ /gzugs mu med pa nyid pas shes rab
518a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /
518a7('bum): sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid
518b1('bum): do| |nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid
518b2('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid
518b3('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid
518b4('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du reg par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces
518b5('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to/ /chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes
518b6('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
518b7('bum): dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa
519a1('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
519a2('bum): nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i gting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang /
519a3('bum): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma
519a4('bum): 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
519a5('bum): dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
519a6('bum): ngus de la sogs par ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //
519a7('bum): rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyis sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /
519b1('bum): phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun
519b2('bum): gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa' tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/
519b3('bum): dper na/ da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te tshul 'di nyid
519b4('bum): dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no/ /de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams
519b5('bum): cad du'ang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ skye ba thams cad du'ang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu skye ste/ tha na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas bcom
519b6('bum): ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar gyur to/ /des mi khom pa thams cad ni/ spangs/ ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni/ bsgrubs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub
519b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrubs pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen
520a1('bum): pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
520a2('bum): kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zungs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag
520a3('bum): la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig / kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/
520a4('bum): kun chub par bya/ gdon par bya/ lung nod par bya/ bstan par bya/ kha ton du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par
520a5('bum): bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor yug tu mar ma'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnams pa mang po dag
520a6('bum): gis bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya/ brjed par bya/ gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ni/ nga'i gdams ngag go /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
520a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
520b1('bum): 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
520b2('bum): kun dga' bo/ khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas
520b3('bum): rim blo byas so/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ da ltar nga bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis phangs pa dang / dad pa dang / gus par byas pa de bzhin du nga 'das nas shes rab kyi pha rol
520b4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di la'ang byas shig / kun dga' bo/ ci nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du yongs su
520b5('bum): gtad do/ /rjes su yongs su gtad do/ /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/
520b6('bum): de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
520b7('bum): dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang /
521a1('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/
521a2('bum): mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang ma bral ba dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang
521a3('bum): ma bral bar rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems
521a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
521a5('bum): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes
521a6('bum): bya ste| bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
521a7('bum): p a'o||
521b1('bum): e mpty page
